description.zh: 本課程針對財務管理基本原理並配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，內容涵蓋：財務規劃與預測、資本預算決策、營運資金政策、長短期融資決策、股利政策、資本資產定價理論、套利定價理論、投資組合理論、合併與收購、行為財務…等。本課程結合財務管理實務並融入財務策略研討，以培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之修習，期許學生能具備財務管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、獨立研究之能力、判斷性思考與決策能力，及制訂並解決財務管理問題之能力。
description.en: This course is case study approach, for the financial management theory to discuss relevant issues with financial decision-making. Seminar covers: Financial planning and forecasting, capital budgeting decisions, working capital policy, short-term and long-term financing decisions, dividend policy, capital asset pricing theory, arbitrage pricing theory, portfolio theory, mergers and acquisitions, behavioral finance, etc. This course combines business management practices and financial strategies into the discussion, in order to foster both theory and practice of financial management personnel. Through the course of the attendance, students should be able to have the financial management of the academic ability to integrate knowledge and expertise, the ability of independent research, critical thinking and decision-making capacity, and ability to solve financial management problems.

notes: 碩士生欲修習此門課，須經授課教師同意

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一.孼疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與孼疫之關聯。二.家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三.醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四.日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include:(1)Immunology: to introduce the interactions between the immune system and the factors of sick building syndrome (SBS) and some specific pathogens.(2)Behavioral science: to investigate the influence of dietary and habit changes on environmental and human health.(3)Medical care: to introduce the difference and the response strategies between sick building syndrome (SBS) and Multiple Chemical Sensitivity (MCS)(4)Daily life: to investigate the influence of daily articles and resident behavior on environmental and human health.

notes: 設計博所與建都所合開，日職合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

name.zh: 光電化學與太陽能電池

description.zh: 光電化學即利用太陽光能源或其他光源驅使一個完整的電化學氧化還原反應，並充分使用光電催化反應後產生的電子轉換為電力，即為太陽能電池，其中有機材料、無機材料與電解質為太陽光電池反應時主要的影響因素。本課程將會介紹光電化學原理與測定, 光電催化, 光電化學能轉移及儲存,不同材料發展出不同型態的太陽能電池，進而介紹光電化學如何應用於染料敏化太陽能電池。
description.en: The concept of photoelectrochemistry is to utilize the solar energy and other light sources to drive a complete electrochemical oxidation-reduction reaction where the photocatalytic electron reaction has been converted into electrical energy. Photovoltaic cells which also known as solar cells composed of organic and inorganic materials and electrolytes are the great example for the photoelectrochemical reactions. Here the proposed course is constructed to introduce and implement the basic photoelectrochemical principles, measurements, photoelectrocatalysis, photoelectrical charge transfer and the storage of chemical energy. Further the remaining section of this course will be focused on the detailed studies about the development of different inorganic, organic materials for the fabrication of dye-sensitized solar cells.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 包含1.先端材料的基礎知識：如材質及過程，複合構造及組織、材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中，可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: ntroduction to Advanced Materials :including composite materials

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種表面分析的技術。
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with atomic-level understanding of surface structure and surface phenomena. The course focuses on the surproperties of the solid-gas and solid-vacuum interfaces because most of the results of modern surface-science studies on the atomic level come from the scrutiny of these interfaces. It contains the following topics: the atomic-level structure of clean and adsorbate-covered surfaces, adsorption and desorption, surface diffusion, surface segregation, the nature of the surface bonding, the adsorbate-adsorbate interaction, energy transfer during gas-surface interactions and surface reaction; surface analysis techniques.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋討論光電學之基本應用原理並結合分子生物學之知識 （諸如 脫氧核糖核酸核糖核酸 蛋白質 或細胞的基本結構介紹） 希望能更拓展學員對光電學應用的眼界本課程目標將藉由了解光電探測儀器之操作應用,光源控制,與光源種類之差異（諸如gamma射線, X-射線, UV 光,紅外線與可見光), 進而將之應用於生物分子的觀察,與生命科學應用上,範圍之廣無可界限.
description.en: This course covers optoelectronics combine with biomolecular of knowledge. We will focus on discussing how the DNA, RNA, protein or cells related with optoelectronic application.Optoelectronics is the study and application of electronic devices that source, detect and control light, usually considered a subfield of photonics. The light often includes invisible forms of radiation such as gamma rays, X-rays, ultraviolet and infrared, in addition to visible light, which is based on the quantum mechanical effects of light on semiconducting materials. A biomolecule is any organic molecule that is produced by a living organism, including large polymeric molecules such as proteins, polysaccharides, and nucleic acids as well as small molecules such as primary metabolites, secondary metabolites, and natural products. As organic molecules, biomolecules consist primarily of carbon and hydrogen, nitrogen, and oxygen, and, to a smaller extent, phosphorus and sulfur.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 1. Matlab/Simulink簡介2. 控制系統建模3. 線性時變控制系統分析4. 可觀測性與可控制性5. 李亞普若夫穩定度分析6. 曲線擬合與系統建模7. 控制器設計8. 數值範例演練
description.en: 1. Introduction to Matlab/Simulink2. Modeling of Control Systems3. Analysis of Linear Time-Varying Control Systems4. Observability and Controllability5. Lyapunov Stability Analysis6. Curve Fitting and System Modeling7. Controller Design8. Numerical Examples

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力的關鍵，本課程主要內容為：    1.能源成本控制    2.區域型電力能管理策略    3.能源系統的經濟性設計概念    4.冷暖系統的檢測與分析    5.總合能源操作的工程化資料收集    6.新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to.1.Compare and contrast the various forms of energy eonversion.2.Examine the techmologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3.Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4.Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5.Deformine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6.Analyze the methods in which energy can be conserved with in the various energy sectors of society.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

name.en: Internet of Things and Sensor Networks

description.zh: (1)物聯網概述，(2)物聯網感知層，(3)物聯網網路層，(4)物聯網應用層，(5)物聯網平台與雲端運算，(6)無線感測網路802.15.4與ZigBee，(7)無線感測網路應用，(8) RFID原理與應用，(9) WSNs至IoT，(10)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1) Introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT), (2) IoT: Perception Layer, (3) IoT: Network Layer, (4) IoT: Application Layer, (5) IoT Platform and Could Computing, (6) Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs): 802.15.4 and ZigBee, (7) WSN Applications, (8) Principles and Applications of RFID, (9) WSNs to IoT, (10) Recent Advances and Related Research Issues.

name.en: Introduction to Mobile and Wireless Networks

description.zh: (1) 通道配置， (2) 網路協定， (3) 行動網路系統， (4)現行無線系統， (5)衛星系統， (6) 隨意與感測網路， (7) 無線區域廣域和個人網路。
description.en: (1) Channel Allocation， (2) Network Protocols，(3) Mobile Communication Systems， (4) Existing Wireless Systems， (5) Satellite Systems，(6) Ad Hoc and Sensor Networks， (7) Wireless LANs, MANs, and PANs

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程針對目前通用之真空系統原理、設計及實務組裝等議題進行說明與分析。將先針對真空系統進行分類說明，並陳述真空系統實務組裝時所要考慮的事項，以及說明真空系統的抽氣概念與設計。真空腔體的設計原理將會詳細說明，並介紹中低真空、高真空及超高真空的系統設計。
description.en: This class explains and analyzes issues concerning the principle, design, and assembly of vacuum systems that are commonly used today. We will begin with the classification of the vacuum system, then goes into the cautions regarding the assembly of the vacuum systems, as well as the concept and design of the air extraction of the vacuum system. We will also discuss the design principles for the vacuum cavity, and the system design for medium-low, high, and super-high vacuum systems.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

name.en: The technology and application of solar thermal energy system

description.zh: 本課程目的為訓練學生獲得在太陽熱能系統與製程應用領域上高階智識理論。課程教材含蓋數種太陽熱能轉換系統用以產生電能、熱水、冷暖氣與照明等用途，主要內容包括太陽輻射幾何學、追日型太陽能聚光器、太陽能史特靈發電系統、太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷暖氣系統、太陽能海水淡化、太陽能照明系統等等章節。期使學生未來能實際應用於各種不同太陽熱能轉換系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the advanced principles and application of solar thermal energy system and processes. The material presented in the course covers several technologies for the conversion of solar thermal energy to provide electricity, hot water, heating, and desalination. The course outline mainly includes analysis of solar geometry and radiation, performance of sun-tracking solar concentrating collectors, solar stirling power system, solar water heating system, solar space heating and cooling system, solar optical lighting system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to the plan and design of many types of variable solar thermal energy system in year to come.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 能源工程主要為介紹現有能源供應系統包含熱能及電能，上課的內容為包含熱流原理導論及再生能源、傳統火力電廠與汽電共生系統的系統原理介紹。
description.en: The concepts of thermal energy and electrical energy will be included in the Energy Engineering; the different energy system which will be introduced is as follows: renewable energy, traditional thermal power plant and cogeneration power system.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 介紹學校產學合作教育理念、策略、程序、工作內容、案例與教學策略、產學訓合作教育模式，探討學校產學合作相關機制與問題，以作為應用之基礎。
description.en: Academic knowledge generates practical usage for technical-vocational school, and practice value from technical-vocational school helps to improve the academic world. This course is to explore the collaboration strategy, concept, cases, contents, and procedures for basis of application.

description.zh: 針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行主題探討，同時，就技職教育與訓練或人力資源等領域的相關從業人員進行能力分析，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: The course aims to (1) exploration of the main research in occupation analysis, (2) exploration of competency analysis in technical-vocational education and training program or in the field of human resource. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；課程重點包括認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派之分析、學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢等。
description.en: This course aims to study the peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on learning psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches, cognitive approaches and other related theories, types of learning, and applications of learning theories.

name.en: Career Planning and Management for Employees

description.zh: （一）瞭解生涯規劃與經營的理論及實務；（二）探討生涯規劃與經營模式；（三）應用生涯規劃與經營模式。課程內容包括：生涯規劃與生涯管理的定義、內涵與功能、生涯探究指引、生涯目標設定、生涯策略、生涯評估、生涯管理議題、人力資源支持系統及組織生涯管理系統。
description.en: The course arms to (1) Understand the theory and application Of career planning and management. (2) Explore the model of career planning and management. (3) Apply the career planning and management model. It covers the definition, essence, and function of career planning and management, a guide to career exploration, career goal setting, career strategies, career appraisal, and contemporary issues in career management, human resource support system, and organizational career management system.

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

notes: 共同103B室多媒體室,日夜合開, 限 日7人, 夜7人

description.zh: 探討數位學習方法與策略。內容包括情境學習、建構學習、合作學習、社會學習、自律學習、自我導向學習、專題學習、問題導向學習等。
description.en: To explore e-learning methods and strategies including situated learning, constructivist learning, cooperative learning, socil learning, self-regulated learning, self-directed learning, project-based learning, problem-based learning etc...

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討成人與推廣教育的基礎、方法與其應用的情形，課程括二大部份；第一部份比較成人與推廣教育的理論基礎典範，第二部份除歸納分析主要的成人與推廣教育方法外，也同時探討其在技職專業教育領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course studies the foundations and methods that are relevant to the Adult & Continuous Education. It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the vocational education related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育發展策略

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育教學發展策略，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in education development strategy. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research in education development strategy and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 課程從統計模式(迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

description.zh: 介紹高分子材料：如纖維、塑膠、橡膠、生醫高分子化合物等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of polymeric materials. The various types of organic materials such as fibers, plastics, rubbers and biomedical polymeric compounds will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在於讓研究所學生就建築構造與施工學們有進階性之認識、探討與操作。故包含講義授課、校外專家專業分享(結合雙師計畫)、實務課題分組操作等進行方式。廣義之建築構造應包含:建築材料應用、建築構法原理、設計與介面整合、建築生產與管理等面向，故本課程以上述關鍵詞進行為期十八周的訓練。期望訓練研究生具有獨立專業思考、整合技術、發掘現場課題、創出新生產手法之能力。
description.en: The planning of building system is an essential part of architectural planning. But it needs strengthen badly in our architecture study. In this course we use a systematic approach to handle the mechanism of integration in building systems, and the method of conduction, that may promote our design density and building quality. This course contents: Introduction of contemporary System Theory Divide and unify of building systems Concepts and methods of System Integration Cases and experiments of integration in building systems

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 資訊蒐集技術是研究生在從事研究工作與論文寫作時必須具備的工具。本課程主要目的在協助研究生在眾多的資訊來源中，如何搜尋正確及高品質的資訊。課程內容涵蓋資訊蒐集技術的原則及應用，並探討多種的實用工具及電子資訊來源，以滿足研究生在作研究及論文寫作上對資訊的需求。
description.en: Information gathering skills are essential to the studying of graduate students and the development of their subject knowledge on dissertation/thesis writing. The course is designed to help graduate students to find the right kind and the right quality of information from the vast amount available.  The content of the course will deal with the broad principles and practices underlying information gathering techniques which explore the many practical tools and electronics sources of information that will help graduate students find the information they need when doing research or writing the dissertation/thesis.

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

name.en: Advanced Application of Sensor and Transducer Mechatronic

description.zh: 感測器及傳感器之設計與製造、訊號處理迴路設計、感測器內部電路之逆向工程、感測器與與機械設計、感測器之應用與匹配
description.en: Principle of Sensors and Transducers，Design of sensing element , Signal Conditioning Circuit Design，Mechanical Design and Packaging of sensor， Fabrication of sensor，Selection and Application of the sensors.。

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    現代製造科技原理，現代製造科技研究方法，個案研究。
description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務業的行銷與管理，主要內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務業創新（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）service innovation, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）service pricing.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以哈佛式企業個案研討及撰寫為主。課程中，包含傳統式與哈佛式兩種教學方法之比較，各產業個案之研討，及個案撰寫之方法。各產業個案之研討中包含議題有企業營運模式之變革，服務創新，科技化服務，與企業電子化等。個案撰寫包含教學手冊及個案之學理背景及應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to teach the Harvard’s case teaching and case writing. In the course, it includes the comparison of traditional case teaching with the Harvard’s case teaching, the industry case study, and the theory of case writing.  In industry case study, several topics will be cover above like business model reengineering, service innovation, and IT innovation. In case writing, the theory of the teaching note and case analysis will cover.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 介紹日本設計思維與研究成果，包含日文中設計的相關詞語，藉由導讀與討論設計相關日文期刊雜誌與書籍体驗日本的設計思維。並透過課題演練以達到設計文化交流的積極意義。
description.en: N

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

name.zh: 低碳經濟與低碳社會建構

description.zh: 21世紀國際為確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展，國際紛紛採取氣候變遷相關因應措施，低碳化已成為全球之共同趨勢。本課程將介紹節能減碳與低碳經濟及社會之國際趨勢、國際溫室氣體減量與能源安全相關法規、我國溫室氣體減量與節能相關法規等，並介紹碳足跡、碳中和等概念，由國際相關案例看我國邁向低碳經濟與社會挑戰與機會。
description.en: To ensure the sustainable development of environment, economy and society, effective measures are gradually adopted by internationals. Low-Carbonization obviously becomes a global common tendency. This course will be introduced the international tendencies of “energy saving & carbon reduction” and “low-carbon society”. It will also be introduced with related regulations of international greenhouse gases reduction, energy security, Taiwan GHG reduction, energy saving. The above concepts and latter concepts of carbon footprints and carbon neutral will be introduced with international practical cases to refer to challenges as well as chances toward a low-carbon Economy and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 1.工程最佳化方法導論2.線性規劃法3.非線性規劃法4.多目標函數最佳化5.近代數學規劃法介紹6.機械之元件與系統之最佳設計
description.en: 1. Introduction to Engineering Optimization Methods. 2.Linear Programming Methods.3.NonLinear Programming Methods.4.Multiobjective Optimization.5. Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming.  6. Optimum Design of Mechanical Components and Systems.

name.zh: 電腦整合實體模型設計

description.zh: 1.實體模型設計簡介與應用2.實體模型設計軟體功能與使用者介面之簡介(簡介構成軟體的各項模組)3.建構繪圖環境(訂置繪圖工具列與草圖顯示內容)4.建構參考幾何(繪製草圖，尺寸標註、產生基準面、曲線、曲面等)5.使用特徵(填料、除料、伸長、掃出、旋轉…等的使用)6.組件的繪製(特徵編輯，處理組件的組態…)7.組合件的處理(處理方式、產生組合件、爆炸圖、模型組態、於零組件中註記)8.鈑金零件9.熔接10.工程圖的處理(訂製工程圖範本、產生工程圖、組件與組合件的視圖)11.模型外觀的處理(材質、顏色、光源)12.輸出與輸入檔案的處理
description.en: 1.	Introduction and Applications of solid modeling2.Introduction of functions and user interface of software for solid modeling3.Create working environoment4.Reference geometry5.Using features6.Working with parts7.Working with assemblies8.Sheet metal9.Weldments10.Create engineering drawing11.Out-looking treatment (materials, color, light source,…)12.Importing and Exporting files

description.zh: 研究期刊內容，針對學生之學習，提出研究心得閱讀報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或論文寫作之能力。研究方法二強調質性研究，例如：以深度訪談以及參與式觀察法探究互動行為脈絡，課程內容包含質性研究導論、質性研究過程與步驟、質性研究設計、質性研究方法、譯碼的程序、質性資料蒐集與分析、質性研究報告撰寫、質性研究在創新設計研究上的應用。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and pr92tical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis. This course provides graduate students with the ability of fundamental concept and design creation or research thesis. These research methods two focus on qualitative research with the exploration of in-depth interview and participant observation. The details of content includes introduction, research process and appro92hes, research design, research methods, coding scheme, data collection and analysis, writing up and implication of innovation and design. The te92hing methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discuss

name.en: Special Topics on Inter92tive Media Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of inter92tion design, inter92tive media and inter92tive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design pr92tice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of inter92tive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of inter92tive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a inter92tive media design project.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

notes: 使用進修部排課教室,使用進修部教室(兩年開設一次)

name.zh: 整合經營策略個案分析
name.en: Integrated Business and Strategy Management Case Studies

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，主要以策略管理與營運模式為核心，在每個個案討論當中，同時由策略管理、人力資源管理、組織管理、服務管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生從策略的角度，學習這些管理功能的整合與營運模式，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Strategy Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Strategy, HRM, Organization Management, and service Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

name.zh: 產業政策與企業優化研討
name.en: Seminar on Industry Policy and Business Betterment

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，政府需訂定各項政策來因應潮流之變化並輔導產業更具競爭力。本課程將使EMBA學生了解政府相關產業政策，並透過一些成功案例探討製造業服務化、服務業科技化與國際化及傳統產業特色化等相關技術及對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, government often tries to assist industries to boost their competitiveness with various public policies. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest industrial policy plans and potential benefits on encompassing the creation of a service-oriented manufacturing industry, an internationalized and high-tech services industry and a specialty-oriented traditional industry. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以Excel進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生瞭解服務特性、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務創新和策略等，期望公司未來能成為卓越經營之企業。 課程內容包含服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
description.en: Service management and innovation is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept, Service delivery system, Service quality, Service strategy, Service innovation, Customer satisfaction, and Case study.

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以品牌理論來探討品牌行銷策略的重要關鍵議題。課程內容包含品牌特性、品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、品牌策略。身為公司品牌經營者，面對國際化與多變化的行銷環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, organizations, business. The topics covered in this class include: The nature of brand, brand marketing, brand competition, brand strategy. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand decisions under the internationalized and changeable marketing environment.

name.en: The Leadership Philosophy of Senior Manager

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階主管的領導理論與實務。課程目的有三個：(1)了解高階主管的領導與管理；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界高階主管提供具體建議。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of senior manager’s leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is (especially for the senior managers); (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for senior managers’ leadership.

description.zh: 本課程介紹公司管理者在作財務(或其他)決策時，會產生的心理偏誤。另外，本課程也提供管理者如何避免心理偏誤，並改善其決策程序。本課程以心理學的角度來探討公司管理者的決策。
description.en: This course introduces how psychological biases affect managers' financial (and other) decision making processes. The psychological biases include excessive optimism, overconfidence, confirmation bias, illusion of control, representativeness, availability bias, anchoring, framing, loss aversion…etc. In addition, this course is also to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 透過講解設計力創新理論/知識、實務案例研討、相關影音觀賞，研習設計力創新策略/流程/能力，整合商學管理與設計創意/創新/創業之共創思維與實戰能力。
description.en: Design driven innovation has emerged to be an alternative way to generate sustainable competitive products or services. To produce products which are design-driven innovation, companies need designers who “envision and investigate new product meanings through a broader, in-depth exploration of the evolution of society, culture, and technology acting as interpreters who are able to envision how people could give meaning to things through intense involvement in the design discourse” (Verganti, 2008). Verganti (2009) proposes three distinct process stages of design-driven innovation, in terms of listening, interpreting, and addressing.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉末冶金學"的學生，對粉末冶金製程與粉末冶金技術的應用有更進一步的認識。課程的安排在製程方面，強調粉末特性對粉末冶金製程的影響，成形模具的設計，燒結理論與現象，燒結体的後處理等。應用方面以本國現有的粉末冶金工廠與其製品為主，例如：機械零件、超硬工具材料、磁性材料、電接點材料、摩擦材料等製程的講述。
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Topic of powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子材料（其中最主要者為積體電路之材料）。首先說明製造方法上之三個主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。1 .半導體物理特性基本概念，2.半導體製程初論，3 .薄膜製程原理，4 .擴散原理，5 .黃光製 程原理，6 .蝕刻製程原理，7 .晶片封裝，8 積體電路製程整合。本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子材料（其中最主要者為積體電路之材料）。首先說明製造方法上之三個主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。1 .半導體物理特性基本概念，2.半導體製程初論，3 .薄膜製程原理，4 .擴散原理，5 .黃光製 程原理，6 .蝕刻製程原理，7 .晶片封裝，8 積體電路製程整合。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Semiconductor Materials.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

name.zh: 第二語言習得專題討論

description.zh: 本課程將對第二語言習得的主要議題進行深入地探討論與分析。上課的內容包括，但不限於，下列主題: 語言天賦、跨語言影響、人格特質、學習動機、學習風格、學習策略、外語焦慮和外語學習信念等。
description.en: This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of selected issues and problems in second language acquisition. The topics covered in this course include, but are not limited to, the following: language aptitude, cross-linguistic influences, personality, motivation, leaning styles, learning strategies, language anxiety, and learners' beliefs.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創作能力，寫作文類包括詩、小說和戲劇，乃至任何別出心裁的新類型，如以非小說類型呈現的多媒體創作。學生經由本課程所學的教巧訓練和寫作策略的運用，不但將具備寫作的能力和深度，更可直接將此能力學以致用，發揮在專業寫作上，包括新聞、設計、廣告以及藝術管理行政。
description.en: Students in this course obtain practical experience writing poetry, fiction and drama, as well as in working with the newly emergent creative writing genres of creative non-fiction and multi-media performance.  The skills, techniques and strategies learned in this class will not only help students realize their own abilities and insights as writers, but are directly applicable to wide range of professions, including journalism, design, advertising and arts organization administration.

name.zh: 經典文學作品創意教學

description.zh: 本課程主旨在向各級學校的英語師資，或對西洋文學文化有興趣的社會人士，推薦英美文學經典作品作為創意教學的教材藍本，兼具創意教學此一領域的理論介紹與創作實務。學員們藉由對英美經典文學作品與其相關之多媒體文化產物的研讀和探索，激起反應、反省與靈感，進而以英文創作作為回饋，朝向創意產業邁進。本課程設計的目標在激發學員多方面的能力：（1）瞭解英美經典文學作品的文字之美與文化意涵、（2）用英語表達的習慣、（3）用英文創作的潛能、以及（4）進入英語文化創意產業的準備。
description.en: This course introduces English literary cannons as the basis for teaching creativity and the related theories and practices. Students will be exploring a series of multimedia and cultural products created based on English literary cannons and in terms creating their own works. Students of this course are expected to develop in these four aspects: 1. Understanding English literary cannons and their cultural implications; 2. Expressing oneself well in the English language; 3. Creating in the English language; 4. Equipping for the English cultural and literary creative industry.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、世界英語，以及英語作為國際語言的發展與相關論述，並針對英語在全球擴散的現象，檢視相關的概念與理論。本課程將探討因英語全球化所造成，在社會語言學、文化、政治經濟與教育等方面的重要議題，以及與世界英語相關的議題與爭論。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with an overview of the spread of the English language around the world, the emergence of World Englishes, and the development of the popularization of English as a world lingua franca. It examines the various concepts and theories developed in academia to account for the unprecedented global expansion of English. Through readings and class discussion, this course will look at key sociolinguistic, cultural, politico-economic and educational issues arising from the spread of English as well as the current issues and debates surrounding World Englishes. Students will be encouraged to conduct original research on or detailed analysis of the implications of English as the international language.

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.大量資料運算及案例分析，9.Hadoop 與 Mapreduce，10.雲端運算之SaaS架構，11.實習課程與專題計畫。
description.en: This course focuses on information storage management, infrastructure, service management, security, and migration strategy for Cloud computing as well as the practice of cloud application through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization, 2. Business Continuity, 3. Storage Security and Management, 4. Cloud Scheduling, Performance and Security, 5. Virtualized Data Center building blocks - Virtual Compute, Storage, Network, Desktop, and Application, 6. Cloud Services and Management, 7. Cloud Computing Overview and Business Application, 8. Big Data Computing and Case Study, 9. Hadoop and Mapreduce, 10. Cloud SaaS, 11. Lab. and Final Project.

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

notes: 修課上限18人,資工所與互動所合開

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.en: This course covers processes, methods, and tools associated with the production of robust, high-quality software. The student will be able to�P  understand the reason and purpose of software quality assurance.�P comprehend the ingredients of quality assurance: software quality assurance; configuration management; verification and validation; and test and evaluation.�P understand software life cycles and software processes.�P know the mechanics of Cleanroom software engineering.�P understand the functions of configuration management: identification, control, auditing, and status accounting.�P know the models of automated configuration management: check-out/check-in, composition, long transaction, and change tracking.

notes: 兼任張凱雄客座教授(資工四、資工所與電資外生專班合

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程深入探討吸附與離子交換的基本原理及相關理論分析，進而了解如何設計改進相關之分離技術。內容包括吸附原理、吸附之數學模式、吸附分離技術之應用、離子交換原理、離子交換之數學模式、離子交換分離技術之應用。
description.en: This course will cover the analysis of principle and theory of adsorption and ion exchange. This course contains principle, mathematical model and application of adsorption and ion exchange in separation technology.

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程廣泛介紹社會語言學的各個次領域，目的在引導學生瞭解此領域早期的基礎研究與現代的關注議題。學生可藉此認識英語在社會上的運用以及各種社會變因對於語言運作的影響。修完本課程後，學生有能力辨認現代英語的不同語體、解釋語言使用所牽涉到的社會因素、運用社會語言學中適切的研究方法完成語言研究，並能將社會語言學的概念應用到語言教學。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive overview of sociolinguistic subcategories with the goal of introducing students to both early foundational work and current issues in this field. It provides students with valuable knowledge in the use of the English language in society and the effects of intricate social variables on language operation. Upon completion of this course, students will be able to identify the social varieties of English spoken in the present world, to explain the social factors involved in language use, to use appropriate methodology in sociolinguistics to conduct linguistic research, and to apply sociolinguistic knowledge to language teaching.

name.zh: 譯學新趨勢與翻譯實踐
name.en: New Trends in Translation Studies and Translation Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹20世紀90年代之後翻譯研究興起的「全球化轉向」與「社會學轉向」兩大新趨勢，並深入探討其對翻譯實踐與譯者專業素養所可能帶來的啟示。課程欲含括之翻譯議題如下：（1）全球化轉向-全球化與本土化張力、跨文化溝通、文化認同、權力關係、譯者中介、科技與翻譯、翻譯商品化、非專業翻譯；（2）社會學轉向-翻譯的社會因素（如社會制約與機制）、譯者的社會層面（如譯者角色、慣習與網絡）、翻譯過程的社會學研究（如品質管控、編修與團隊翻譯）。除論文之研讀外，亦將透過翻譯實例的分析（包括新聞、字幕、旅遊、廣告、網頁、商業與文學翻譯等實例），讓學生明瞭這些新趨勢如何引導翻譯實踐，並使其重新省思譯者的專業素養。此外，英漢/漢英翻譯實作與譯評亦為授課重點，期藉此協助學生與時並進，構思適切的翻譯策略。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the "globalization turn" and "sociological turn" in translation studies after the 1990s. An exploration will also be made into their possible implications for translation practice and the translator's qualifications. Translation issues to be addressed may include the following: (1) the globalization turn - the tension between globalization and localization, cross-cultural communication, cultural identity, power relations, the translator's mediation, technology and translation, the commoditization of translation services and non-professional translation (such as fansubbing and scanlation); (2) the sociological turn - socio factors of translation (e.g. social constraints and mechanisms), social aspects of the translator's profession (e.g. the translator's role, habitus and network), and the sociology of the translating process (e.g. quality control, revision and team translation). Through concrete examples of authentic translations, this course will enable s

name.zh: 動畫電影中的中世紀文化
name.en: Knights, Monsters, Castles and Other Things Medieval in Hollywood Movies and Japanese Anime

description.zh: 廣義上，中世紀時期可被定義為由羅馬帝國的衰落開始並持續至十五世紀文藝復興。中古世紀被文藝復興時期的人們視為一段缺乏啟蒙、知識及現代化的黑暗時期。然而許多黑暗時期的故事--如亞瑟王與圓桌武士、聖杯、龍和公主—卻一直以現代書籍及電影的方式流傳至今。本課程將探討弔詭的現代中世紀現象，亦即現代西方如何以多樣的手段去詮釋、改寫或紀念中古世紀，使得這種千年前的文化在現代重生。本課程同時也將討論日本動畫家及漫畫家是如何以動漫的方式將西方中世紀故事及元素巧妙的融合進現代日本流行文化。
description.en: The Medieval Period can be defined broadly as that period from the fall of the Roman Empire to the 15th century Italian Renaissance – a dark time, if one is to believe the men of the Renaissance, in need of light, knowledge, modernization. Yet the stories of these dark ages – of Arthur and his knights, the Holy Grail, dragons and princesses – continue to be retold and enjoyed in modern books and films. This course will examine the paradoxical phenomenon of modern medievalism, looking at the varied ways the modern West has borrowed, celebrated, and rewritten its medieval past, a culture strangely as alive now as it was a thousand years ago. We will consider, too, how western medieval stories and images are also being cleverly adapted and transformed in modern Japanese pop culture by anime and manga artists.

name.zh: 文學與批判理論應用專題
name.en: Special Topic in Literary and Critical Theory

description.zh: 課程旨在以跨領域的思考方法，融合文學與批判理論，探討特定主題如何在作品中呈現，思考在不同文化背景和歷史脈絡中的意義，以訓練學生運用和整合在其他學科，甚至其他學術領域學到的能力：諸如藝術和文學風格，社會和哲學思潮等。透過對文本（文學、電影、和其他藝術領域）的細讀和理論的思考和運用，學生可進一步應用跨領域專題研究的方法。可能的專題包括：文學與復仇文化、文學與音樂、電影中的愛與慾、文學與哲學等。
description.en: This course focuses on a chosen theme in literary and cultural studies, aiming to train our graduate's ability to investigate, both textually and theoretically, a theme in cultural productions in a comparative mode. Integrating the knowledge and insights students have acquired in other courses on artistic styles, social, and philosophical treads in a given period, this course approaches literature comparatively. In the process of examining what a particular theme means across history, students should acquire techniques important throughout their postgraduate studies. Possible themes include: Literature and Revenge, Literature and Music, Love and Desire in Cinema, Literature and Philosophy, etc.

description.zh: 本課程以個案研究和文獻探討方式讓學生了解總體經濟的環境（包括GDP、GNP、失業率、景氣循環、通貨膨脹、政府的財政政策和貨幣政策的規劃與制定、匯率制度、總合供給與需求等課題）。
description.en: This course is to analyze the macroeconomic policy, international economy, business cycles, government policy, exchange rate and other macroeconomic-related issues. The course will be taught with case studies and journal literature. Group discussions are needed.

description.zh: 自21世紀的資通訊（ICT)產業的興起，跟隨著物聯網（IoT)和大數據(Big Data)分析與運用時代來臨。我們將共同探討：由產業發展趨勢，產品創新設計與研發，到產業行銷，應用，與管理的關鍵要素，以符合工業4.0趨勢。
description.en: In the twenty first century, innovation is the key factor which brings profits to our technological stagnation.  However, without the right strategy with some killer-tactics implemented, the innovation may turn good things up side down. This course, Product Innovation Strategy, is given from a practitioner’s viewpoint on how to deploy the concepts, knowledge, and experiences related to information and communication industry (ICT), Big Data (BDA) and Internet of Things (IoT). We will study, review, and design new product project to help the students develop capabilities on ICT new product development and project management in order to reach the market trends and demands for the Ubiquitous Computing technology on the 3rd Platform era.

name.zh: 跨文化創造力與創業家策略

description.zh: 本創新課程主要專為本校管理學院之國際學生而規劃, 為了培養      本院畢業之國際管理碩士IMBA學生, 運用其跨文化之多元優勢, 與在本管理學院受多元學門之培育, 未來能成為跨國產業界之優秀領導者, 貢獻人群。透過動態激盪之個案研討, 與實戰模擬, 學生們將能啟動其創造力, 學習開發與創新思維, 進而建立其創造性思考, 分析邏輯之架構, 與實務界問題解決之道之整合管理能力。學生們亦將學習多元化之企業主題, 包括有跨文化之商業交涉與溝通協商, 創意之行銷策略, 創業家精神,  組織發展與團隊管理, 領導學等實務模擬。經過整套課程之培育, 透過哈佛管理個案與跨文化相關產業之分析與研討, 期許IMBA國際學生們將建立實際應用到未來之職涯規劃與機會開展之學識, 技術與能力, 並本著具有仁愛, 與誠信正直之寬廣胸懷, 進而成為未來之優秀領導人。
description.en: This course is specifically designed for our International MBA studentswho have the heart of passion and willingness to become great leaders after graduation for their future career.  Through dynamic brain-power training, knowledge and intelligence building, case study and international simulations, we will activate the creative genes in each one of our IMBA students.  We will build their creative thinking, analytical reasoning, and problem solving abilities.  In the spirit of inspirational leadership, we will develop their creative marketing, managerial and organizational skills in the process of entrepreneurial case study and simulations.  Students will be able to draw upon their cross-cultural knowledge and learn how to apply what they have learnt in our business schools.  The main topics to be covered include cross-cultural business etiquettes, creative designing, innovative marketing, cross-cultural communication, analytical planning, cross-cultural negotiation, risk-taking, and

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

description.zh: 資源工程的製程技術範圍包括了一些無機性及有機性物質的物理與化學變化。要有效的應用這些物質的製程技術，必須要對製程的化學反應動力學有基本的認識。本課程的主要目的在於教導學生如何設計一個程序以進行所要的化學反應。進行此類程序設計必須要將物理程序與化學程序的速率式相結合。而相關的基本原理包括：物理程序的能量傳送及質量傳送原理，及化學程序的反應動力學。為了達到這個目的，學生要對化學反應的本徵反應速率及程序的輸送現象有基本的認識。此外，本課程亦將介紹反應器設計的基本原理。據此，本課程的教學內容包括：1.	化學反應動力學2.	理想反應器的基本質量守恆3.	等溫與非等溫反應器原理4.	非均質反應程序、觸媒與吸附理論
description.en: Material and resources processing technologies focus on the physical and chemical process of inorganic and organic materials. For effective applications of these processing technologies, understanding the principles of chemical kinetics is essential. The major objective of this course is to learn how to design a process for carrying out desirable chemical reaction. To design this process requires rates of both physical and chemical processes. The principles governing such physical processes as energy transfer and mass transfer are often as important as those which govern chemical kinetics. To combine the rates of chemical and physical process, the essential feature is to understand the intrinsic rate of chemical reaction and the transport phenomena of the process. In addition, the basic principles of reactor design will also be introduced based on abovementioned fundamental principles. Therefore, the contents of this course include:1.	chemical kinetics2.	fundamentals of mass conser

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 期望學生對各種儲能材料(包括水溶液系統電池、非水溶液系統電池、鋰電池、超高電容器、儲氫合金等)基本認識，進而了解各種能源材料之電池應用、材料結構、合成與電化學特性。本課程內容含有: (1)課程簡介, (2)電化學基本原理與應用, (3)水溶液系統電池分類與應用,(4)非水溶液系統電池分類與應用, (5)鋰電池原理、反應機構、市場、應用、構造與製造流程, (6)鋰電池正極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (7)鋰電池負極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (8)電解液材料與高分子電池特性, (9)隔離膜材料功能與製作, (10)薄膜電池, (11)超高電容器材料原理與應用, (12)儲氫合金材料與應用
description.en: The aim of the "Energy Storage Material and Application" class is designed for students to get the basic understanding for the energy storage devices and materials. The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

notes: 化工所與生化所合開,人數限55人

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
description.en: This course provides a broad technical introduction of theory and practice of Artificial Intelligence(AI). The topics include:history of AI, agents, search, knowledge representation, machine learning, and oerception and cognition.

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一.孼疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與孼疫之關聯。二.家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三.醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四.日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include:(1)Immunology: to introduce the interactions between the immune system and the factors of sick building syndrome (SBS) and some specific pathogens.(2)Behavioral science: to investigate the influence of dietary and habit changes on environmental and human health.(3)Medical care: to introduce the difference and the response strategies between sick building syndrome (SBS) and Multiple Chemical Sensitivity (MCS)(4)Daily life: to investigate the influence of daily articles and resident behavior on environmental and human health.

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 本課程主要針對永續建築設計創意進行探討。宇宙萬物瞬息變化，在全球既有之永續建築觀念中，研究者如何在不違背這些觀念的前提下，整合各種不同觀念並提出符合其專業道德之創意思維，以確實滿足符合目前及未來國際潮流對於永續理念的看法；研究者在學習過程中會發現：永續建築設計創意對應永續議題時，那將不只是理論而已，它更必需是融合建築專業實務、技術、道德等因素之結晶。永續建築設計創意不容被挑戰，卻也經常被挑戰；然而，永續建築設計創意如何能夠經得起不同的挑戰與看法，這關乎研究者對於永續建築與設計創意之理解程度；因此，研究者除必需提供相關資訊說明其創意與永續之關係外，更必需提出其創意如何與永續應對，以使所提之創意理念不是空談。換言之，本課程期望透過討論與辯證，進而傳授研究者學習如何整合問題並提出新的思維，而此思維將會符合未來實務所需，以使研究者在學時已具備未來進入職場解決問題之能力。

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論2. 景觀生態設計理論3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 本課程旨在瞭解台灣地域文化中，因人、因時、因地制宜的建築生產過程，及其涉入空間行為因時間積累而呈現的特殊環境型態、類型與結構；即在探討地方自然地理環境，如何經由人類行為的涉入，呈現出富鄉土涵構的人文景觀。
description.en: This course is to understand the relations between human, behavior, material and the environment of architecture in the world. And try to introduce the vernacular characters of Taiwan architecture by the discussion of some special architectural themes.

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 本課程主要探討物業管理理論以及實際的操作手法。並結合現有的物業管理案例說明其實例運作方式在台灣的課題與機會。
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the propertymanagement, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and  Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces.5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

name.zh: 使用者經驗設計與評量

description.zh: 本課程將包含使用者經驗設計的基礎，以及使用者研究量測的內涵及方法。本課程中，將透過課堂上課、討論、以及實習的方式，介紹使用者研究的實際案例、評估模式、團隊合作方法、設計與評估工具、實踐思維、挑戰、以及實際執行的程序。預期學生將於本課程中，透過分組獲得使用者經驗在互動設計、空間設計以及產品設計上，有關使用者研究的設計、評估、施行、以及質化與量化分析量測評估的知識與方法。
description.en: This course will cover the fundamentals of user experience design and provide the students with insights into the measurement of user research. The real-life processes, challenges, considerations, tools, team works, models and case studies of user research are introduced in this course by lecturing, discussing and practicing methods. Students are expecting to learn user experience principles, to designing, evaluating, implementing and measuring user experience in both qualitative and quantitative methods in the aspect of interaction design, space design and product design individually.

notes: 設計701教室,設計博所與互動所合開(設計博班主開主排)

description.en: Technologically, this course introduces the recent developments on digital representations and their applications on design. Theoretically, this course reviews the theories and methodologies of the research applications in the field of design that involves human interaction.

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。

Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

name.en: Advanced Study on Structure System in Architecture

description.zh: 在既有結構系統的認知基礎上，建立對建築材料特性(RC結構、鋼結構及木結構等)及結構系統的整合能力。除了針對案例分析及建築結構系統、材料特性進行分析解說外，配合設計案例並透過簡單的數值分析(Numerical Analysis)操作訓練，培養學生在建築結構系統及造型整合上的設計能力。
description.en: The objective of this lecture is introducing the structural form in Architecture and the latest technology on structural system according to different materials. Meanwhile, the reason why structural system performs an important role on the Architecture form will be introduced as well. By the introduction of the structural form and case study, as well as the basic structure analysis based on Numerical Analysis for structural form design. Students will expected to explore the design possibility through the structural point of view.

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

name.zh: 醫療照護之支持性環境設施設計
name.en: Assisted Living Facilities Design for Health Care

description.zh: 本課程講授醫療照護之社會背景、法規與措施；探討因應高齡社會之長期照護制度、預防性照顧與長照服務、健康老人照顧關懷等服務系統。針對「長照服務量能提升」之需求，本課程介紹支持性環境設施（Assisted Living Facilities, ALF）的理念，探討支持性環境設施的設計與改善，藉以減輕照護人員的負擔，同時維持病人生活自主以及減緩病情的惡化。針對支持性環境設施的設計與改善，本課程闡述產品設計與服務設計之使用性理論，課程內容包括相關的理論和案例研討。
description.en: This course explores the theories of Assisted Living Facilities (ALF) for health care, especially for people with mild and moderate cognitive decline.The application of user needs study and theories of usability on services and products will accommodate the diversity of user base, while supports a broad range of hardware, software, and service network on health care.Issues on Assisted Living Facilities (ALF) will be discussed in order to generate initiatives in response to unmet needs, and then accommodate differences among various user groups.Students are required to study selected literature and present in seminar discussion group.

Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

description.en: Gas Dynamics in Intake and Exhaust Manifold, Emissions and Related Combustion Phenomena, Cycle-Simulation and Analysis, Engine Performance Tuning and Control, Engine Noise Source and Its Control.

The topics will be covered: (1) innovation and R&D management; (2) technology policy; (3) technology forecasting ; (4) technology strategy management ; (5) technology development and transfer; (6) technology planning and measurement.

description.en: This course introduces the concept of power train system, the relationship between engine and power train system, and the mechanical design of power train system. The purpose of this study is to increase the students' understanding in power train system.

description.zh: 由於雲端運算的快速發展，大量資料收集與儲存技術已成瓶頸，大數據技術與管理提供一套具延展性與容錯能力的分散儲存與計算架構, 能有效處理大量複雜數據資料的儲存與運算。本課程除介紹現有的大數據生態與趨勢，並針對目前軟硬體架構的處理瓶頸，提供系統組態與部署、服務層級協定、監控與管理等系統性規劃的解決方案，並導入跨領域的工程管理科學知識。課程簡扼論述大數據技術與管理的重要，並在Hadoop生態系統中，以Cloudera Hadoop為應用範例，實作說明其重要性。課程內容包括：大數據的概念、應用生態與趨勢、Hadoop硬體規格與基礎架構規劃、叢集組態與部署、叢集服務層級協定、叢集監控與管理、相關生態技術、及概略介紹Hadoop認證與準備。
description.en: The course will introduce Apache Hadoop core technologies and administration with its major including: Big Data (BD) in demand and its application trend, Core technologies of Hadoop for BD management, Hadoop Administration and management tool, Hadoop cluster deployment,YARN applications plus MapReduce, Hadoop cluster hardware and software, Introduction of Hadoop ecosystem projects, HDFS configuration for high availability (HA), Hadoop security, Cluster resource scheduling and configuration, and Hadoop certification program, etc.
