description.en: The course is designed to explore the rationale of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, including the concept of curriculum, theories of curriculum development, principles and models of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, and the problem of curriculum development in technical-vocational education in Taiwan.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

notes: 智財所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 非線性光纖光學與應用

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields.  Due to  its small core and relative long propagation length of fiber and relative large  power and peak power light source is used, that is generated from mode-locked technique and amplifier, various nonlinear optical phenomena can be observed through propagation of the fiber.  Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

name.en: Fabrication of Potoelectronic Materials and Device

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。 1.單晶的生長 2.磊晶技術 3.擴散與離子植入 4.乾式及溫式蝕刻 5.化學蒸氣沈積法 6.金屬薄膜技術 7.光電元件製程 8.元件特性量測與分析
description.en: 1.Single crystal growth 2.Engitaxial technique 3.Diffusion and implantation 4.Dry and wet etching 5.Chemical vapor deposition 6.Metal film coating 7.Manufacturing process of photo electronic element 8.Characterization measurement and analysis of element

description.en: (1)Introduction (2) Polarization representation (3) Optical wave in Anistropic media (4) Jones Matrix Method (5) Liquid crystal displays (6) Properties of liquid crystal display (7) Liquid Crystal Spatial Light Modulators (8) Applications

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

name.en: Design of switching mode power supply

description.zh: 1.簡介2.功率級電路3.轉換器架構與分析4.控制電路5.回授電路6.保護電路7.電路佈局與機構8.應用電路分析
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Power Stage Circuit3.Converter Topology4.Control Circuit5.Feedback Circuit6.Circuit Protection7.Circuit Layout and Machanism8.Application Circuit

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 電力系統簡介3. MATLAB簡介4. 電力潮流分析5. 最佳化調度6. 電力系統故障之研究7. 電力系統穩定度分析
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Power system matrix3. Introduction to MATLAB4. Power flow studies5. optimal Dispatch6. Fault Studies7. Power system stability

description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
description.en: This course provides a broad technical introduction of theory and practice of Artificial Intelligence(AI). The topics include:history of AI, agents, search, knowledge representation, machine learning, and oerception and cognition.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

description.zh: 軟性計算最佳化與傳統計算(硬性計算)最佳化的最主要差別在於軟性計算可以容忍對問題的不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性。實際上，軟性計算的主要模型係依據人類思維的模式或是生物系統的運作而發展出來的。軟性計算的主要導引基礎為:利用不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性，以獲得可追蹤，強健以及快速的解。軟性計算主要源於1965年由Zadeh所提出的模糊集理論，1973年提出的複雜系統分析與決策支援，1979年提出的軟性資料分析與機率理論。在更後期也陸續提出類神經計算與基因演算。本課程主要針對基因演算法(GA)與演進歸化法(EP/ES)進行討論，其他的方法如粒子群集(PSO)，模擬退火法(SA)也在本課程介紹之列。
description.en: The differences between Soft computing and conventional (hard) computing in that it can tolerant imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation. The key model for soft computing is the human mind or biological systems.  The guiding principle of soft computing includes: Exploit the tolerance for imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation to achieve tractability, robustness and low solution cost. The basic ideas underlying soft computing in its current incarnation have links to many earlier influences, among them Zadeh's 1965 paper on fuzzy sets; the 1973 paper on the analysis of complex systems and decision processes; and the 1979 report (1981 paper) on possibility theory and soft data analysis. The inclusion of neural computing and genetic computing in soft computing came at a later point. The main focus of this course will be in Genetic Algorithm (GA) and Evolutionary Programming/Evolutionary Strategy (EP/ES).  Other methods such as Particle Swarm Optimizat

description.zh: 演化計算最佳化與傳統最佳化的最主要差別在於演化式計算係透過迭代方式逼近最佳解。由於所使用的目標函數可以容忍對問題的不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性，因此更適合處理實務的工程問題。演化式計算緣起於演化式規劃，基因演算法則透過數學模型的推導，驗證其可以使用在解決最佳化問題。本課程主要針對基因演算法(GA)與演進歸化法(EP/ES)進行討論，其他的方法如粒子群集(PSO)，模擬退火法(SA)也在本課程介紹之列。
description.en: The differences between Evolutionary Computing and conventional computing in that it obtains the near optimal solution through iterations. Because of the characteristics of the fitness functions, the evolutionary computation is more tolerable for imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation to achieve tractability, robustness and low solution cost.  As a result, the evolutionary computation can be more suitable for solving engineering problems. The origin of the evolutionary computation is from the Evolutionary Planning.  Through a formal mathematic modeling, the Genetic Algorithm is proved to be used to solve optimization problems. The main focus of this course will be in Genetic Algorithm (GA) and Evolutionary Programming/Evolutionary Strategy (EP/ES). Other methods such as Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), Simulated Anneal (SA) will also be discussed.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 三自由度剛體動力學、廣義座標、約束的研究、變分學、Hamilton原理、Lagrange方程式、多剛體動力學、穩定性
description.en: Three-Dimensional Dynamics of Rigid Bodies, Generalized Coordinate, Research of Constraints, Calculus of Variations, Hamilton's Principle, Lagrange's Equations, Multi-Body Dynamics, Stability

description.zh: 本課程將以車輛之傳動系統設計與分析為主要內容，傳動系統之定義為從動力源至驅動輪間之各項組合，其中包括離合器、加力箱、變速箱、差速箱、傳動軸與最終傳動等組合，由於每種車輛行車特性之不同，因此前述之各項組合有不同之排列方式，傳動系統設計之優劣往往影響到車輛之行車性能。本課程將從車輛行駛阻力推演出傳統系統設計之理念及方法，並針對如何發揮動力源之最佳特性，搭配良好之傳動系統設計以達到較佳之行車性能為主要教學之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the vehicle drive-train design and analysis. Topics include definition for drive-train system、clutches、transfer case、manual transmission、automatic transmission、differential gear、transmission shaft  and final driver.  Fundamentals of vehicle tractive resistance will deduce the methodology of drive-train design.  The good drive-train design will result in optimal vehicle tractive performance.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 1. 離散時間訊號與Z-轉換2. 取樣原理3. 離散傅式轉換與快速傅式轉換4. 數位濾波器系統設計5. 同位訊號處理6. 時變訊號處理-短時域傅式轉換7. 離散時間隨機程序8. 離訊與訊號估測
description.en: 1. Discrete-time signal and Z-transform 2. Sampling theorem 3. Discrete Fourier Transformer(DFT) and Fast Fourier Transformer(FFT) 4. Digital Filter Design5. Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源(如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源(如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等)及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

notes: 億光13樓研討室 Rm.1343,Building Everlight 13F

description.zh: 本課程是設計給研究所的理工科學生作為研習科技法律的入門課程，內容大體上包括有專利法簡介、商標法簡介、著作權法簡介、營業秘密法簡介、網域名稱簡介、個案討論等等。在二十一世紀知識爆炸的時代中，技術創新已然成為企業競爭力不能忽視的一環，成功的企業無不就其開發出來的技術想盡辦法佈施層層法律保護網，於是，如何分析解讀競爭對手的法律保護網，如何研發出完全相容又具競爭性的產品，是現代研發單位不能不面對的一項課題，所牽涉到的層面多與科技法律相關。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary technology law study for graduate school students majoring in science and engineering . It is focused on issues related to: An introduction to Patent Law, An Introduction to Trademark Law, An introduction Copyright Law, An Introduction to Trade Secret Law, An Introduction to Domain Name and Case Discussions, etc. In the 21st century characterized by the information explosion, technological innovation has been widely recognized as being a vital factor to the competitiveness of business. Successful companies have always tried their best to implement broad-reaching legal protection of their innovated technologies. Consequently, it appears to be essential for every R&D unit to know how to analyze the legal protection for the competitors' products and how to develop a fully compatible and competitive product.

notes: 智財所新聘，與材料所合開

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

notes: 大四與碩班合開  雙語教學

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。
description.en: In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

name.en: Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering Slope Stabilization

description.zh: 生態工法的概念和原則近年來廣泛地引介和應用在各種的土木工程領域中，包括河溪、坡地、都市和交通建設等，而由於土石流和坡地災害的頻繁發生，因此在山坡地應用生態工法遂成為重要的課題，也逐漸成為應該提供給土木系學生，使其瞭解相關基礎知識的重要課程，因此在本導論課程中，我們將介紹如何將生物地工技術和土壤生物工程（Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering）應用在邊坡穩定和侵蝕控制上，使學生認識並瞭解目前在邊坡保護上結合工程力學分析、植物學知識和實際案例應用的發展，並藉此介紹國內外常用的邊坡穩定工法，以及結合不同傳統擋土設施的可行方式。本課程無先修課程限制，建議研究所和大學部高年級同學選修。
description.en: The concept and principles of ecological engineering has been widely adopted by various disciplines of traditional civil engineering,including hydraulic engineering, slope stabilization, urban infrastructures, and transportation engineering.  Among them, slope stabilization is a particularly important topic because of thefrequent occurrence of debris flows and landslides in Taiwan, and thus it becomes necessary to provide such a course to familiarize students with this important field.  In this introductory course, we will explain the fundamental concepts of biotechnical and soil bioengineering and how to apply them to the slope stabilization anderosion control.  An interdisciplinary approach that combines the knowledge and understanding of both mechanical design and vegetation properties will be emphasized.  The results can be integrated with traditional retaining structures to create more economical and eco-friendly slope stabilization systems.  No prerequisite.

description.zh: 衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 本課程只在針對互聯網發展下如何釐清其中關鍵議題如什麼是互聯網、互聯網核心思維、互聯網與物聯網之區別、互聯網影響哪些行業、傳統性企業如何在物聯網時代轉型、及其未來之發展。之後其中之理論及各產業之應用案例之研討亦包含其中。
description.en: This course will focus on the development of the Internet for how to clarify the key issues such as what is the Internet, the Internet core thinking, the difference between the Internet+ and the Internet of Things, the impact of the Internet on which industry, how traditional enterprises in the era of things transition, and its future development. After which the theory and the application of the case study of the industry also includes them.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1. Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

name.zh: 進階半導體與光電廠務設施
name.en: Advanced course on facility system of semiconductor and photonic fabrication plants.

description.zh: 本課程為半導體與光電廠務設進階課程, 主要針對半導體與光電廠務設施作深入的論述，課程包含廠務設施的九大系統：冰水機系統、排氣系統、電力監控系統、壓縮空氣系統、氮氣系統、純水系統、真空系統、製程冷卻水系統及外氣空調系統。期使修習本課程之學生有一和實務聯結之機會，並和理論作相相互映證。有校外教學且學生必需完成一小型計劃.
description.en: This advanced course aims to provide students a broad scope of hand-on knowledge on the facility system of a semiconductor or photonic fabrication factory. The facility system includes nine sub-systems: chilled water system, exhaust air system, compressed air system, process cooling water (PCW) system, vacuum system, ultra pure water (UPW) system, power and monitoring system, nitrogen system and make-up air system. Course material is basically based on and closely linked with field operational experience. A factory visit tour will be arranged. A mini-project will be carried by participating students.

description.zh: 物聯網能讓所有能行使獨立功能的普通物體實作互聯互通的網路，在物聯網上，每個人都可以應用電子標籤將真實的物體上網聯結，在物聯網上都可以查出它們的具體位置。通過物聯網可以用中心電腦對機器、裝置、人員進行集中管理、控制，也可以對家庭裝置、汽車進行遙控，以及搜尋位置、防止物品被盜等，類似自動化操控系統，同時透過收集這些小事的資料，最後可以整合成大數據。物聯網將現實世界數位化，應用範圍十分廣泛，包括運輸和物流領域、健康醫療領域範圍、智慧環境（家庭、辦公、工廠）領域、個人和社會領域等，具有十分廣闊的市場和應用前景。本課程將介紹物聯網基本概念、相關技術與應用。
description.en: The Internet of Things (IoT) is the network of physical objects—devices, vehicles, buildings and other items — embedded with electronics, software, sensors, and network connectivity that enables these objects to collect and exchange data. The IoT allows objects to be sensed and controlled remotely across existing network infrastructure, creating opportunities for more direct integration of the physical world into computer-based systems, and resulting in improved efficiency, accuracy and economic benefit. In this course, concepts, technologies and applications of IoT will be introduced.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

notes: 博班；工管博與管理博合開

description.zh: 山坡地開發、規劃與施工，高樑建築基礎施工與監測，水庫工程之調查與規劃，捷運系統規劃、調查與施工。
description.en: 英課名：The geography engineering case analyze        To open up and develop mountain slope, plan and         construction.        Base construction and to monitor of high beam         building.        Investigate and plan of reservoir engineering.        A rapid transit system plan, investigate and         construction.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation engineering control        System framework of investigation engineering         control.        Investigation plan and period procedure arrange.        A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生在熱流學領域上的基本知識，課程內容主要包括: 1. 熱力特性簡介， 2. 熱力學基本定律， 3. 基本冷凍空調循環， 4. 流體特性簡介， 5. 柏努利方程式， 6. 管內與管外流， 7. 穩態與暫態熱傳分析， 8. 散熱片之熱傳分析， 9. 強制對流分析， 10. 自然對流分析， 11. 具相變化的熱對流: 凝結與沸騰。
description.en: This course is to teach students the basic knowledge of thermo-fluid sciences. The main content includes: 1. Introduction to thermodynamic properties, 2. Basic laws of thermodynamics, 3. Fundamentals of Refrigerating and air-conditioning cycles, 4. Introduction of fluid properties, 5. Bernoulli equation, 6. Internal and external flows, 7. Steady and transient heat conduction analysis, 8. Heat transfer from extended surfaces, 9. Forced convection, 10. Natural convection, 11. Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation.

name.zh: 半導體與光電廠務設施
name.en: The facility system of semiconductor or photonic fabrication

description.zh: 本課程主要針對半導體與光電廠務設施作一般性的論述，課程包含廠務設施的九大系統：冰水機系統、排氣系統、電力監控系統、壓縮空氣系統、氮氣系統、純水系統、真空系統、製程冷卻水系統及外氣空調系統。期使修習本課程之學生有一和實務聯結之機會，並和理論作相相互映證。
description.en: This course aims to provide students a broad scope of hand-on knowledge on the facility system of a semiconductor or photonic fabrication factory. The facility system includes nine sub-systems: chilled water system, exhaust air system, compressed air system, process cooling water (PCW) system, vacuum system, ultra pure water (UPW) system, power and monitoring system, nitrogen system and fresh air system. Course material is basically based on and closely linked with field operational experience. A factory visit tour will be arranged.

description.zh: 本課程主要在講述工業催化製程開發之基本原則，管理方法，技術突破的執行要領及策略運用，並探討數個工業催化製程開發成功與失敗的實際案例。授課內容從化工產品的生產技術演變特性及組織架構，歷史經驗的分析開始。產品以石化產品為例，論及原料來源的轉變，工廠設備技術的進步。進而講述工業催化製程在工業催化劑功能開發及製程技術革新下，雙管齊下，如何達成工業催化製程開發的目標。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the basic principles, management, skills to reach technology break-through, and strategy for the development of industrial catalytic process. Real cases of the success and failure of development of industrial catalytic process in chemical industry will also be reviewed. Contents of the lectures will start with the analysis of the evolution, the industry structures and historical experience of chemical industrial products.      Using petrochemical products as examples, we will discuss the shift of the raw materials, the progress of plant equipments,  and how chemical engineers simultaneously address the developments of improved catalyst and process technology to accomplish the mission of the development of catalytic process in chemical industry.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學

description.zh: 在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

description.zh: 本課程介紹現有無線區域網路規格的多工存取層及實體層，並深入解說規格中所使用通訊技術的原理，如載波偵測多工－避免碰撞通訊協定，正交分頻多工調變技術。
description.en: This course contains the medium access control layer(MAC) and physical layer(PHY) of the mose recent IEEE 802.11 standards for wireless local area networks. Thechniques employed by the standards, e.g.,craier sense multiple access/collision avoidance (CSMA/CA),orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing (OFDA), will be discussed in details.

description.en: This course encompasses the most complete treatment on the electromagnetics for wireless communication engineering. It includes the physical and mathematical foundations of the theory of advanced electromagnetics, time-harmonic electromagnetic fields, electrical properties of matter, and other novel topics related to modern microwave and millimeter-wave technology.

description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

notes: 電子所與電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 本課程包含：1.散射參數與網路分析儀2.頻譜儀介紹3.自動化量測4.平面化傳輸線5.射頻集總元件與阻抗匹配6.積體電路封裝7.射頻耦合器8.射頻濾波器學生能從這門課學習到射頻被動元件的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.S-parameter and Network Analyzer2.Introduction to Spectrum Analyzer3.Automatic Measurement4.Planar Transmission Lines5.RF Lump Elements and Impedance Matching6.IC Package7.RF Coupler8.RF FilterThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of RF passive circuits from this course.

name.zh: 混合訊號積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.混合訊號設計概述 2.連續時間濾波器 3.交換電容濾波器 4.交換電流濾波器 5.數位類比轉換器 6.類比數位轉換器 7.超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8.管線式類比數位轉換器 9.混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

name.zh: 智慧車用通訊網路系統設計
name.en: Intelligent Vehicle Communication Network System Design

description.zh: 本課程目標在於探討與設計智慧車用網路通訊系統，課程內容分別介紹車用通訊技術，內部連接網路通訊系統，LIN (Local Interconnect Network)通訊協定、CAN (Controller Area Network) 通訊協定、FlexRay通訊協定、MOST (Media Oriented Systems Transport)，以及探討車用無線通訊與乙太網路(Ethernet)系統，同時介紹各個通訊協定間之閘道器設計。本課程進行方式以講演授課及系統實作，課程大綱如下：1.簡介2.LIN通訊協定與系統3.CAN通訊協定與系統4.FlexRay通訊協定與系統5.MOST通訊協定與系統6.閘道器設計7.無線通訊與乙太網路(Ethernet)系統8.專題研究
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss and design the intelligent vehicle network communication system. The course contents include: vehicle communication technology, internal connection network communication system, LIN (Local Interconnect Network) communication protocol, CAN (Controller Area Network) communication protocol, FlexRay communication protocols, MOST (Media Oriented Systems Transport). The wireless communications and Ethernet systems in vehicle will be discussed. The gateway design between the various communication protocols is introduced. The procedure of this course uses lecture presentation and to practice system implementation. The course outline is as follows:1.Introduction2.LIN communication protocol and system3.CAN communication protocol and system4.FlexRay communication protocol and system5.MOST communication protocol and system6.Gateway design7.Wireless communication and Ethernet (Ethernet) system8.Project research

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1.電源管理IC設計簡介 2.電壓參考電路設計 3.低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4.交換式電壓調整器 5.交換電容電源轉換器 6.電池充電技術與應用 7.設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何設計與應用微控制器，啟發學生對於微控制器的創意設計。包含：1.相關程式撰寫、2.跑馬燈程式撰寫與實作驗證、3.序列埠控制 (監控視窗、LED控制)、4.七段顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、5.LED矩陣程式撰寫與實作驗證、6.LCD顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、7. PWM馬達控制程式撰寫與實作驗證、8. I2C介面程式撰寫與實作驗證、9.電子琴程式撰寫與實作驗證。10.超音波感測程式撰寫與實作驗證。
description.en: This course is to train students for microcontrollers design and applications.  Inspire students to creative microcontroller design. Comprising: 1. Related programs written. 2. Marquee program written and implement verification. 3. Serial port control (monitoring windows, LED control). 4. Seven segment display program written and implement verification. 5. LED matrix program written and implement verification. 6. LCD display program written and implement verification. 7. PWM motor control program written and implement verification. 8. I2C interface program written and implement verification. 9. Keyboard program written and implement verification. 10. Ultrasonic sensing program written and implement verification.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎   1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質   1.2 遞迴關係之解   1.3 數學歸納法2. 基本分析技巧   2.1 計算複雜度之上下限   2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析   2.3 動態平均分析3. 基本設計技巧   3.1 分擊法   3.2 貪婪法   3.3 動態規劃   3.4 隨機演算法4. 計算複雜度   4.1 資訊理論證明法   4.2 對抗式證明法   4.3 問題之線性轉換   4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background   1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions   1.2 Solving recurrence relations   1.3 Mathematical induction2. Basic analysis techniques   2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds   2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis   2.3 Amortized analysis3. Basic Design Paradigms   3.1 Divide and conquer   3.2 Greedy methods   3.3 Dynamic programming   3.4 Probabilistic algorithms4. Computational Complexity   4.1 Information-theoretic arguments   4.2 Adversary arguments   4.3 Linear reduction of problems   4.4 NP-completeness

name.zh: 資訊技術在醫學工程之應用
name.en: Applies Information Technologies to Medical Engineering

description.zh: 1.醫療資訊標準 2.醫療儀器設計 3.遠距醫療系統 4.遠距照護系統 5.數位訊號處理在醫工之應用 6.PACS的設計與規則 7.輔助設計
description.en: 1.Medical Informations Standards 2.Medical Instrument Design 3.Telemedicine System 4.Telecare System 5.Digital Image Processing in Medical Engineering 6.Design & Plan of Picture Achieving and Communications System 7.Help System Design for Disable

description.zh: 本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本有限差分法、流體力學與熱傳方程式的有限差分法應用、有限體積法、格點產生法。
description.en: This course comprises four parts. Part one is fundamentals of finite-difference methods. Part 2 is the application of finite-difference methods to the equations of fluid mechanics and heat transfer. Part 3 is finite-volume method. Part 4 is grid generation.

description.zh: 期望學生對各種儲能材料(包括水溶液系統電池、非水溶液系統電池、鋰電池、超高電容器、儲氫合金等)基本認識，進而了解各種能源材料之電池應用、材料結構、合成與電化學特性。本課程內容含有: (1)課程簡介, (2)電化學基本原理與應用, (3)水溶液系統電池分類與應用,(4)非水溶液系統電池分類與應用, (5)鋰電池原理、反應機構、市場、應用、構造與製造流程, (6)鋰電池正極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (7)鋰電池負極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (8)電解液材料與高分子電池特性, (9)隔離膜材料功能與製作, (10)薄膜電池, (11)超高電容器材料原理與應用, (12)儲氫合金材料與應用
description.en: The aim of the "Energy Storage Material and Application" class is designed for students to get the basic understanding for the energy storage devices and materials. The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要包括下列主題：1.全球企業發展的外在環境、2.全球技術突破與創新產業、3.各國研發創新及品牌智財策略、4.IP產業建置、5.全球品牌智財市場、6.全球企業及其智財管理的規劃與移轉、7.創新研發的保護方式、8.協同合作與獨立作業的比較、9.兼顧節稅的智慧財產權開發模式、10.跨國視野下的法律議題、11.企業智財部門規劃、12.併購與智財授權管理、13.品牌智財的財務價值、14.著名全球企業智財管理模式。
description.en: This course will focus on the following topics: 1.external environments for corporate developments, 2.new technologies and innovative enterprises, 3. R&D and branding polices of major countries, 4. the establishment of IP industries, 5. global branding markets, 6. the plan and transfer of global enterprises & IP location, 7. the protection of R&D, 8.the choice between joint and individual R&D, 9. tax plan for IP development, 10.IP plan for international industries, 11, the establishment of IP department, 12.M&A and IP, 13.the evaluation of brands & IP, 14.the IP management of well-known global enterprises,

description.zh: 營業秘密法係為保障營業秘密，維護產業倫理與競爭秩序，調和社會公共利益，所特別制定之法律。該法所稱營業秘密係指方法、技術、製程、配方、程式、設計或其他可用於生產、銷售或經營之資訊，而符合左列要件者：一、非一般涉及該類資訊之人所知者。二、因其秘密性而具有實際或潛在之經濟價值者。三、所有人已採取合理之保密措施者。
description.en: Trade Secret Act is enacted to protect trade secrets, maintain industrial ethics and order in competition, and balance societal and public interests.The term "trade secret" as used in this Act shall mean any method, technique, process, formula, program, design, or other information that may be used in the course of production, sales, or operations, and also meet the following requirements:(1)It is not known to persons generally involved in the information of this type;(2)It has economic value, actual or potential, due to its secretive nature; and(3)Its owner has taken reasonable measures to maintain its secrecy.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹歐盟專利法規，課程重點將以歐盟專利公約為主，並將包含歐州專利局的上訴委員會的案例。此外，相關歐盟會員國的專利案件也將於本課程中介紹。本課程每週將指定閱讀教材，修習本課同學，須先自行研讀，並參與每週課堂中的討論。
description.en: The course will provide an introductory overview of the regulations of European patents. The emphasis will be on the substantive law under the European Patent Convention, including the jurisprudence of the EPO Board of Appeals. In addition, relevant cases decided by members of EPC will be addressed.

description.zh: 愈來愈多的商業活動在網路上進行，蓬勃發展的電子商務，也對現有的法律與政策造成許多挑戰。本課程將對電子商務的發展做一概要介紹，其後由網路科技與智財法律的概論談起，接著以目前智財法規所面臨的議題為主，並挑選台灣與國際的知名案例，讓學生兼顧理論與實務，建立對電子商務法規與政策發展的認識。
description.en: Doing business online is more and more prevalent nowadays, nonetheless, as e-commerce activities striving rapidly, new legal challenges are calling for attention. This course will start with an introduction on the characteristics and developments of e-commerce activities, following by the exploration and discussion on relevant literature and cases. Noted that this course will focus on the intellectual property laws and make comparative studies in order to equip students with an in-depth understanding and knowledge on these issues.

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下： 1.專利權利項解讀 2.專利侵權分析流程 3.專利迴避設計要件 4.專利策略分析 5.專利佈局實務 6.案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

description.zh: 科技的進步不僅利於人類文明的創新，也考驗當代法律制度是否能確保法正義的理念與法秩序的維持。本課程主要是探討我國與先進國家智慧財產權、公平交易法、消費者保護法、電子商務、網路犯罪與生物科技法律等問題。
description.en: The advance of technology facilitates an innovation of human civilization; in addition, it also proves to be a test of the modern legal system-seeing whether a balance between legal justice and legal order can be maintained. Some important topics available for class discussion are: intellectual property, fair trade law, consumer protection, e-commerce, internet crimes and biological technology.

notes: 新聘教師陳志遠老師，與材料所在職專班合開

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

name.zh: 新能源車輛技術發展與實務工程
name.en: Technology Development and its Industry Engineering Practice

description.zh: 本課程在於讓學生對於新能源車輛產業及其工程實務有廣泛的了解，產業面包括產業現況、法規、政策、動力系統技術，工程實務則涵括動力、傳動、能源、控制等系統之開發及維護，及車輛業界產品開發中心及維修廠之企業參訪。課程中之動力系統將包括半複合動力、全複合動力、純電動車及氫燃料電池系統，能源系統將討論鉛酸電池、鎳鐵電池、鋰電池，及其充放電機制及管理系統。
description.en: 1.To educate student to have a general comprehensive knowledge on green vehicle industry status, regulation, policy, powertrain technology and its Industry Engineering Practice including the development and maintenance processes of the powertrain, transmission, energy, control systems, and the industry practice at the product development center or the service station of the car company. 2.The powertrain system will include the mild-hybrid, full hybrid, pure motor drive, and fuel cell systems. The energy system will include the introduction of the lead acid, nickel-metal hydride, and lithium-ion batteries, and their charging-discharging mechanism and its management devices.3.This class will lead the students to be able to learn the process of the green vehicle development and also to have an opportunity to receive the lectures from the car maker experts on the car maker product development center or the service station.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1)脊椎生物力學、(2)關節生物力學、(3)骨折生物力學、(4)復健生物力學、(5)運動生物力學、(6)心血管生物力學、(7)植入物設計原理、(8)手術器械設計原理、(9)矯具設計原理與(10)病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

notes: 限博士班 綜科館708室

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本守恒定理，流體運動學，特殊形式方程式，理想流體（二維，三維勢流）表面波，低雷諾數流體，邊界層流體振波．
description.en: Basic Conservation Laws , Flow Kinematics , Special Forms of Governing Equations, Ideal-Fluid Flow ( Two-dimensional , Three-dimensional Potential Flows )Surface Waves , Low-Reynolds-Number Solutions , Boundary Layers , Shock Waves

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電腦在工程設計應用為主，內容有電腦輔助繪圖含電腦三維實體模型建立、電腦模擬、最佳設計、有限元素分析等。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided engineering techniques applied in mechanical engineering design. The course contents will include topics on computer aided design and draft including the creation of 3D solid model, computer simulation, Optimization technique, and finite element analysis techniques

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: 製科所與機電所合開  限20人

description.zh: 本課程藉由優質學術論文內容的解析，協助研究生學習並改進學術論文寫作的技巧，經由實作增強投稿發表的能力。內容涵蓋學術論文主題的精選，研究問題的界定，文獻回顧的深入，論文結構的建立與文字的鋪陳，研究發現的討論與結論的撰寫，針對論文完成後投稿的步驟及審查意見的回覆等均以實例進行探討。
description.en: The course helps PhD students to practice and improve their writing skills for academic purposes. The key components of the course focuses on the discussion of some selected papers from high quality journal articles to absorb their writing and presenting skills. Hence, the students can have better opportunities to produce satisfied academic articles to meet the requirements for publication and degree dissertation.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

name.zh: 材料特性與熱管理實務應用

description.zh: 在諸多工程應用實例中，如LED、晶片之散熱問題、流體在能源系統中之熱交換、燃料電池衍生之熱問題等，都與材料之規格選用、處理方法、加工方式、製造過程有明顯的相關性。本門課程主要針對材料工程與熱管理相關的技術問題，提出探討與對策，期使學生對熱管理在材料與系統工程上的應用提供適當的專業知識。
description.en: In engineering applications, such as LED, chip cooling, heat exchange in energy systems, fuel cells, are always comes with the problems of thermal generation. Meanwhile, manufacturing process and heat treatment of these products are also strongly dependent of the selection of material specifications. The purpose of this course would like to employ practical problems and lead the students in finding appropriate solutions or technical approaches to solve the related problems they could meet.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

description.zh: 擴增實境 (Augmented Reality, AR) 著重在與真實世界的結合，增強真實世界裡的資訊顯示與互動經驗，透過該產品，能夠輕而易舉地得到真實景物的資訊。本課程內容先介紹AR原理、技術發展與限制、可應用的展示平台、與其他技術搭配應用、各領域應用案例，如數位學習、醫療、即時翻譯、展示、遊戲與娛樂。
description.en: Augmented Reality (AR) concerns about the combination between real and virtual world. AR technology is to display information inside any objects or devices. The course will introduce AR principles, technology development and constraints, applicable display platform, combination with other technology, implication cases in any fields such as digital learning, medical care, instant translation, display, game and amusement.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了(但不限於)人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en: This is an undergraduate course dealing with decision-making and analysis. The objective of this course is to interpret the basic Concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problems. The main topics of this course include decision making without probability, decision making with probability, decision analysis with additional information, utility theory, game theory. The related studies includes probability distribution, expected value approach, Bayesian analysis, expected value of perfect information and sample information

description.zh: 本課程只在針對互聯網發展下如何釐清其中關鍵議題如什麼是互聯網、互聯網核心思維、互聯網與物聯網之區別、互聯網影響哪些行業、傳統性企業如何在物聯網時代轉型、及其未來之發展。之後其中之理論及各產業之應用案例之研討亦包含其中。
description.en: This course will focus on the development of the Internet for how to clarify the key issues such as what is the Internet, the Internet core thinking, the difference between the Internet+ and the Internet of Things, the impact of the Internet on which industry, how traditional enterprises in the era of things transition, and its future development. After which the theory and the application of the case study of the industry also includes them.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 第1階段限博士生選,開學碩士生選須面試且不計畢業學分

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性的相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。
description.en: The topics of this course include interactivity, and virtual experience, virtual community, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship.

name.zh: 智慧整合感控系統概論

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作智慧整合感控系統(CPS)，其中包括：感測、無線通訊、嵌入式系統與雲端計算相關技術，將以上課及實作的方式讓同學們習得智慧整合感控系統的相關背景知識和設計能力，預計在這門課之中，學生們將能以做中學的方式，並透過實習方式在嵌入式平台上練習定位、體感與分散式計算等系統建置。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in cyber-physical system design. The outline of this course is given as follows. 1. Introduction, 2. Embedded Development Tools and Environment, 3.Wireless Sensor (Multi-hop) Communication, 4. Discrete System and Sensor Modeling, 5. Distributed Computation Modeling.

notes: 電子大四與電子所合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in the design of software-defined networking (SDN) for wireless network. The outline of this course is given as follows: 1. Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

notes: 電子大四與電子所合開

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 使用者導向設計強調「以人為中心」的開發理念，而非以技術為中心；運用「設計思考」之理念，深入探索消費者未被滿足的需求與渴望。本課程以「使用者參與式設計」、「角色與情境故事」、「情境脈絡」等設計方法探索使用者之潛在需求，從研究對象本身的架構來探究行為與現象，挖掘創新概念。
description.en: User-centred Design is a process in which the needs, wants, and limitations of end users of a product are given extensive attention at each stage of the design process. It is a user-oriented innovative design process of discovering users’ potential demand and desire.This course introduces Ethnographic Research Method for discovering Users' Experience and Users' Value Models.  Methods include Participatory Design, User Profiles and Scenarios, Contextual Inquiry and Narrative Practice.Design practices will be carried out for creating broader and effective experience through service and products.

description.zh: 介紹當代應用於設計研究和發展自設計研究的各種重要理論，當作博碩士生研究與創作的準備。內容包括將設計視為目標導向、賦予價值的一般性問題解決活動，以及將設計視為檢驗溝通傳達過程與模式的調查研究，幫助研究生綜覽各種知識傳統下的設計理論，有效掌握並發展特定研究主題的適當理論與方法。
description.en: Introduction of contemporary theories applied to and developed in design research, in which design is considered as a mode of inquiry, including examination of communication process and models, and emphasizing general problem-solving as a goal-directed, value-laden activity.

description.zh: 課程以人因研究為基礎，分為四個階段：文獻資料收集與分析、人因實驗、創新設計、使用者受測評估實驗。透過系統化人因研究與應用設計之步驟與流程，帶領學生了解人因研究之實驗方法，啟發人本設計概念。
description.en: The course is based on ergonomic. There are four stages: literature review, ergonomic experiment, creative design and evaluation. Students will learn the scientific research method in ergonomic through step by step process.

name.zh: 設計研究與創作專題(二)
name.en: The Research and Practice on Design Issues (II)

description.zh: 針對特定設計議題，學生學習應用研究與設計理論，並透過適當研究與設計方法探討其潛在的問題與有效的解決方法。議題主要針對：產品、空間、資訊、機構識別等設計行銷與服務設計、評量與管理等項目之研究與創作。課程研習結果可望作為研究生進階研究或設計創作之重要基礎。
description.en: Focusing on specific design issues, the subject directs students to apply proper theories and methods in research and design in order to explore critical problems and to provide effective solutions. Specific issues in relation to marketing and service management regarding the design of product, space, information and corporate identity are to be researched and be practiced. The result of study forms the foundation of further research or design development for research students.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(一)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(I)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

description.zh: 本課程透過專題討論方式，針對學生之設計研究主題進行研討，透過實務相關議題之深入解析，培養學生之研究方法及論述的能力，建立自己的研究架構，經由(一)至(四)個階段之訓練，使研究議題能由淺入深，完成其各階段性之設計研究專題。
description.en: This course is focus on the discussion of students’ deign topics in seminar form. Through the in-depth analysis of practices related issues to train students’ research methods and discuss ability; and construct their own research frameworks. Furthermore, students could complete each design projects of different stages through four stages training.

description.zh: 本課程係透過跨領域整合之創新思維，針對設計領域之專業理論與實務，進行相關文獻探討、個案研究及專題實務案例等深入研析，培養研究者之設計專業觀察與洞察能力，並能提出設計相關問題之解決方案，與具創新與前瞻性之具體可行方案，並實際應用於設計專案之實務操作，以期培育學生從創新思維到實務設計能力，進行設計教育之翻轉。
description.en: This course aims at the professional theory and practice in the field of design through the innovative thinking of interdisciplinary integration. It conducts in-depth research on relevant literatures and case studies. It can cultivate the professional ability of observation and insight of design professionals. Design-related solutions, and innovative and forward-looking concrete and feasible programs, and practical application of the practical operation of the design project, in order to cultivate students from innovative thinking to practical design capabilities, design education flip.

description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意（1） 瞬時平面運動學：Hartman構圖法,反曲點元，切線圓，Euer- Savary方程式，Bobillier構圖法，四連桿組耦桿之直線包絡線方程式，                      Higher Curvature（2） 平面連桿機構分析：Freudenstein方程式，速度及加速度，傳遞角與機械利益，多迴路連桿組分析（3） 其它機構分析：凸輪，齒輪組，非圓形齒輪
description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

notes: 機電所與製科所合開【停開】

description.zh: 學生將有系統的瞭解人因照明的技術內涵、研究方法、使用領域規範以及應用技巧。課程中將結合實際案例講解人因照明設計手法與實際效果。該課程將有助於學生全面掌握照明硬體技術和以人為本的照明設計藝術，以及如何將兩者結合並應用在照明設計實務中。
description.en: Explore the concept and related technologies of ergonomic lighting in various applications.  Study the industry from an overall perspective, with emphasis on theories, research methods, international standards and design techniques.  Understand the definition of ergonomic lighting design, procedure and strategies, including evaluation of lighting quality, lighting technologies in hardware and software, as well as the art of lighting design.  Ergonomic lighting applications will be illustrated in case studies.

notes: 億光835；光電四與光電所合開

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 機電博所與製科所合開；限博士生修習

description.zh: 1.光纖感測介紹，2.光纖感測元件，3.光纖感測系統，4.光纖感測多工技術，5.光纖雷射感測系統，6.長距離光纖感測系統，7.大範圍多點光纖感測系統，8.光纖感測網路。
description.en: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.

name.zh: 新能源車輛技術發展與實務工程
name.en: Technology Development and its Industry Engineering Practice

description.zh: 本課程在於讓學生對於新能源車輛產業及其工程實務有廣泛的了解，產業面包括產業現況、法規、政策、動力系統技術，工程實務則涵括動力、傳動、能源、控制等系統之開發及維護，及車輛業界產品開發中心及維修廠之企業參訪。課程中之動力系統將包括半複合動力、全複合動力、純電動車及氫燃料電池系統，能源系統將討論鉛酸電池、鎳鐵電池、鋰電池，及其充放電機制及管理系統。
description.en: 1.To educate student to have a general comprehensive knowledge on green vehicle industry status, regulation, policy, powertrain technology and its Industry Engineering Practice including the development and maintenance processes of the powertrain, transmission, energy, control systems, and the industry practice at the product development center or the service station of the car company. 2.The powertrain system will include the mild-hybrid, full hybrid, pure motor drive, and fuel cell systems. The energy system will include the introduction of the lead acid, nickel-metal hydride, and lithium-ion batteries, and their charging-discharging mechanism and its management devices.3.This class will lead the students to be able to learn the process of the green vehicle development and also to have an opportunity to receive the lectures from the car maker experts on the car maker product development center or the service station.

description.zh: 由最原始的原點即動物的觀點，觀看並理解「人類」所營造出的空間領域，並討論其意義及重要性。
description.en: The course focuses on observation and understanding the territory created by human in terms of the viewpoint of animals, which could be the most original one, and discuss the importance and the meaning.

notes: 設計603，日職合開,中日雙語授課

description.zh: 論文指導教授與醫師協商讓學生於在學期間的寒暑假到論文研究相關醫院進行實習。
description.en: Advisor in consultation with physicians suggest the student to practice at the hospital related to the thesis research during the winter and summer vacations at school.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解通路策略之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路策略的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路策略的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程、通路行為與通路策略等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in Channels Strategy. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making Channel Strategic decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations. The topics have function and flow of channel, channel behavior, and channel strategy.

description.zh: 由於網際網路的快速發展，帶來了一個新的商務模式的發展。本課程希望能給同學們對企業創新課題的廣泛性了解，也深入的介紹一些基本的觀念和原理原則。另外，企業創新，許多都和新科技的新應用有關，而當中許多的可能性都還在發展階段，本門課主要是在探討創新的一些基本觀念，以及國內外企業創新的案例。
description.en: Since the Internet EB fast development, the new business model should be developed. This course will offer some topics related to business innovation and management issues. The fundamental concept and theoretic principle will also introduce.   Besides, the concept and applications of business and service model, business process reengineering, and the case study will also include.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物分子及這些生物分子所扮演的角色。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。再論及DNA複製及轉錄和RNA轉譯成蛋白質的重要性及機制。PCR和DNA重組技術的重要性是安排在最後來介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce a series of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The phenomena of DNA replication and translation, and RNA translation will be studied. The PCR method and DNA recombinant technology also included in this course.

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

name.en: Applied Technology of the Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解物聯網 (Internet of Things)的本基概念及其所應用的各種技術。本課程包含(1)簡介(2)物聯網的基本架構及其關鍵技術，(3)物聯網感知層及其應用技術，(4)物聯網感網路層及其應用技術，(5)物聯網應用層及其應用技術，(6)無線感測網路工作原理及實習，(7)RFID工作原理及實習。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the basic concepts and applied technologies in the field of Internet of Things. The main subjects of this course include :(1) Introduction .(2)The basic structure of Internet of Things and it key technologies.(3) The device layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies. (4)The connect layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies.(5)The application layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies.(6)The principle and practice of wireless sensor network.(7) The principle and practice of RFID.

description.zh: 1.自動化概念 2.個人電腦之介面 3.人機介面發展平台 4.視窗應用界（API）：動態連結程式庫（DLL）動態資料交換（DDE）及Active X基本程式設計 5.用戶端與伺服端系統架構 6.虛擬實境及多媒體的應用 7.簡介人工智慧專家系統模糊與類神經在人機界面的應用 8.圖形監控發展系統：輸出入DDE ， 網路DDE ， 監控網路 ，多感測系統。
description.en: main -machine Interface (MMI)1.Introduction to automation 2.Perosn computer Interface 3.Platform of main machine interface :Windows operation system. 4.Windows Application program Interface :DLL,DDE and active X program design.5. Client Server system 6.Multi-media and Virtual reality.7.Introduction to the application of AI, expert system, Fuzzy and neural network in MMI.8. Graphic Control user interface:I/DDE,NET DDE,monitor network and multi-sensory system.

name.zh: 雲端軟體建置與管理實務
name.en: Practices on Cloud Software Development and Management

description.zh: 本課程旨在培育雲端軟體系統開發與管理人才，邀請業界專家講授雲端軟體服務的開發與管理。課程內容涵蓋了：雲端產業論述、雲端軟體需求工程、雲端軟體設計、雲端資料導向系統設計、雲端文件管理系統設計、雲端報表管理系統設計、雲端資料轉移策略及雲端行動策略等議題。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the development and management of cloud software systems. We invite industrial experts to teach students how to build and manage cloud software systems. Topics include cloud software introduction, cloud requirements engineering, cloud software design, cloud data-driven application, cloud document management application, cloud report management application, cloud data migration and the mobile solution in cloud.

notes: 資財三四與資財所、最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在邀請實務界專家介紹投資決策與理財之應用實務，以培養學生建立其證卷投資分析、金融工具分析、企業評價及資本市場之基本與技術分析等決策能力。
description.en: This course is to invite industrial experts on investment to introduce the practical applications on investments. This course is to develop their abilities on equity investment analysis, financial instruments, business evaluation, the fundamental and technical analysis of capital market, and other decision-making ability.

notes: 資財三四與資財所、最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

name.zh: 製造與工作環境之AR/VR實務
name.en: AR/VR Practice of Manufacturing and Workspace Design

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何把擴增實境(Augmented Reality)及虛擬實境(Virtual Reality)技術應用在製造業以及工作環境之實務設計。實務操作單元包含：人機互動系統實驗。
description.en: The goal of this course is to empower students in learning and applying the practical uses of AR (Augmented Reality) and VR (Virtual Reality) technology applied in manufacturing and workspace design. The practice sessions include: experimental design of human-machine-interaction (HMI) systems, basic training and application of Unity, etc.

name.en: Technologies and Applications of Car Network

description.zh: 本課程內容著重於車輛網路技術之介紹、整合應用與未來發展，如現在車輛各嵌入式控制之機電整合次系統間的控制資訊，車輛與車輛間的駕駛與運動資訊傳遞，車輛與公共交通管理基礎系統訊息溝通，及車輛與雲端之連結與訊息傳遞，最後這方面的應用可說無遠弗屆，諸如生活資訊交流(物聯網)、車輛健康與維修等資訊之交換及統計分析(大數據)、駕駛健康與緊急事件之處理(智能照顧體系)、智能型導航，及因應正在發展中的移動式分享經濟模式發展所需之資訊交換。
description.en: This course will focus on the importance role of integrated application of information communication, which may interchange in between the car as a lot of subsystems made by embedded microcontrollers, occur in between a vehicle to another's(V2V, Vehicle to vehicle information for driving), vehicle to the public traffic infrastructure(the traffic management system of mega-city of highway) or vehicle to Cloud(all kinds of services can be integrated into, for example, living information, car repairing interactive information, driver health monitor, emergency event, smart navigation or many kinds of emerging and sharing  manipulation system for future travelling and motion.

description.zh: 產品研發創新管理課程主要對象為有興趣從事企業產品研發創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹基礎發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。主要內容包含如何辨識企業產品研發創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。    其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在產品研發創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的產品研發創新工具或取更好的工作機會
description.en: Production R&D Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering Production R&D development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem of Production R&D; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their entrepreneurial approaches to Production R&D innovation.    Objective: To develop an understanding of innovation toolkits and systematic innovation approach to help students making better understanding in Production R&D innovation management and equipping with the innovation skills needed to pursue a viable career option.

description.zh: 本課程只在針對互聯網發展下如何釐清其中關鍵議題如什麼是互聯網、互聯網核心思維、互聯網與物聯網之區別、互聯網影響哪些行業、傳統性企業如何在物聯網時代轉型、及其未來之發展。之後其中之理論及各產業之應用案例之研討亦包含其中。
description.en: This course will focus on the development of the Internet for how to clarify the key issues such as what is the Internet, the Internet core thinking, the difference between the Internet+ and the Internet of Things, the impact of the Internet on which industry, how traditional enterprises in the era of things transition, and its future development. After which the theory and the application of the case study of the industry also includes them.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與EMBA學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發EMBA學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange the ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: B2國際會議停廳限碩二工、經、資合開

name.en: The Practice and Application of Building Information Modeling (BIM)

description.zh: 本課程將介紹學生使用BIM進行建築設計、各單位的互相溝通和施工階段的圖面整合。本課程並介紹使用Revit Architecture軟體的基本概念和操作方式。通過軟體使用將引導學生以標準施工設計界面，創造參數係列和準備施工文件。
description.en: This course will introduce students to using BIM for architectural design exploration, communication, and construction. The class will introduce essential software concepts and hands-on operations with Revit Architecture. Hands-on exercises will lead students through the software interface, standard construction systems, creating parametric families and preparing construction documents.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Planning

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and planning in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Planning" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows; 1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology 2. Ecological planning theory 3. The application of ecological theory in landscape practice a. Urban region and countryside b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生區塊鏈與機器人理財的基本概念，使學生能夠創造區塊鏈與機器人理財方面的創新應用。課程內容包括：區塊鏈概論、區塊鏈基本原理、區塊鏈應用、機器學習概論、分類與迴歸、大數據、財富管理、演算法、與機器人理財應用等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of blockchain and robotic advisory and to enable students to develop innovative applications of blockchain and robotic advisory. The contents include introduction to blockchain, blockchain principle, blockchain applications, machine learning basics, classification and regression, big data, wealth management, algorithms and robot advisory applications.

name.en: Financial Technology and Corporate Financial Management

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生金融科技與公司理財的基本概念與應用，以及創新思考的方法，使學生能夠創造金融科技與公司理財方面的創新應用。課程內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、金融科技專利、金融科技策略、資本市場、投資、股價、債務與股利。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and corporate financial management. The goal is to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology and corporate financial management. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, financial technology patents, financial technology strategies, money and capital market, investments, stock price, use of debt and dividend policy.

description.zh: 1. 智慧型控制系統簡介 2. 類神經網路（ANN）系統2-1 類神經網路基礎 2-2 類神經網路應用及實習 3. 模糊邏輯控制系統 3-1 模糊邏輯基礎 3-2 模糊控制應用及實習 4. 基因演算法 4-1 基因演算法基礎 4-2 基因演算法在控制器調制之應用及實習
description.en: English Description: 1. Introduction of artificial intelligence control system 2. Artificial neural networks (ANN) 2-1 ANN fundamentals 2-2 Applications and experiments of neural-control 3. Fuzzy logic control system  3-1 Fuzzy logic basics 3-2 Applications and experiments of fuzzy control 4. Genetic algorithms 4-1 Preliminary of GA  4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms.

name.zh: 整合經營策略個案分析
name.en: Integrated Business and Strategy Management Case Studies

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，主要以策略管理與營運模式為核心，在每個個案討論當中，同時由策略管理、人力資源管理、組織管理、服務管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生從策略的角度，學習這些管理功能的整合與營運模式，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Strategy Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Strategy, HRM, Organization Management, and service Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: Technologies and Applications of Car Network
