description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解行銷管理的概念與理論，建立行銷管理以增加市場優勢。課程主要內容包括：行銷思想、行銷策略、行銷元素、總體行銷與電商行銷。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish concepts and theory ofMarketing Management . Topics are as follows: Marketing Thought, Marketing Strategy, Marketing Elements, Macro Marketing and Online.

notes: 碩士生欲修習此門課，須經授課教師同意

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

notes: 智財所與最後一哩合開；智財所限8人選修

name.zh: 創業講座-互聯網新創浪潮來襲
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures- The Innovative wave in the Internet's Evolution

description.zh: 隨著互聯網的發展與產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 經管三、經管所與最後一哩合開；上課6週每週3小時

name.zh: 國際貿易與關務解析(一)
name.en: Application of international trade and Customs declaration Resolution (I)

description.zh: 目的：協助同學通過我國「關務特考」、「報關專責人員特考」、「國際貿易大會考認證考試」等國家考試中「國際貿易」之相關考科。內容：解析國內國家考試「關務實務」之命題趨勢。並以實際國際貿易中實務操作為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的關貿概念，增進學生對貿易實務與關務理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Purpose: To assist students to pass the relevant examinations of "International Trade", such as " National Special Examination for Customs Specialized personnel", " National Special Examination for Customs Officers", "International Trade Examination for IEAT" and other national examinations.Content: By introducing the practical applications to the students, which guiding students to get a full understanding of International Trade Practice System while solving the problems by using real cases. It reinforces students’ knowledge and understanding on the International Trade, and helps students to think logically and also increases their problem-solving skills that help students to pass the national examinations successfully.

notes: 經管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 運用電腦軟體製作並模擬實物設計，利用電腦技巧學習模擬並展現產品之外型、結構、色彩、質感等。
description.en: This course helps students create and simulate the design of real objects with the assistance of computer in order to display the outlook, structure, color and texture of products.

notes: 須有設計基礎；自備筆電及Alias軟體

name.zh: 創新講座-創意與創新思維(四)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

notes: 工設四、創新所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

notes: 適合初階學習者，已通過日文檢定考試者不適合選修本課

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語1(A1上)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語2(A1下)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh: 21世紀雲端大數據的快速運算，與有線無線的高速傳輸，已帶領人類從工業量產的工業經濟，經由第二波石油能源的機電自動化時代，電腦與資訊革命的第三波，快速進入數位科技4.0 的互聯、共創、共享與分享經濟的「服務經濟時代」。以使用者體驗為中心的「產品服務系統化」（Device for service system)，及「服務系統智能產品化」（Service system with smart device) ，及跨專業協同合作創新，將21 世紀使科技服務人類，企業經營與成長的關鍵！使用者體驗導向設計，與設計思考，己成為今日產業與企業經營創新教育的核心。
description.en: In today's digital technology, cloud big data calculation and high speed communication, the changing of Social、Economic、and Technology，Has been forced human living and society transfer from mass production Industrial economic（Hard power oriented)，trough knowledge economic 、experience economic， to today's customer oriented as well as Service Economic (Soft power oriented)。This course are base on the design think education approach in Stanford d-School--User's Scenario Experience Design & Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation, initiated by prof. Liang and IDEO consultant.

description.zh: 深入探討最新的IC製程技術，包含前段的加熱、離子植入、物理沈積、化學沈積、微影、蝕刻等製程，及後段的各種封裝技術及測試方法，並介紹其研究方向、製程與元件物理的關係及製程整合的技術。
description.en: Study the state of the art of the IC fabrication processes, including heating, ion implant, PVD, CVD, lithograph, etching of the front-end processes and packaging and testing of back-end processes. The trends of the processes, the relationship of the processes with the physics of the devices and the process integrating technology will also be taught in this course.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

name.zh: 服務設計與管理創業專題
name.en: Business Startup on Service Design and Management

description.zh: 從設計的立足點，探討服務管理的理論與實務應用，並以完成新創事業之服務藍圖與模型為研習目標。
description.en: From field of design, the study stresses the research and application of Service Management theories, and aims at the completion of service blueprints and service models for a startup business.

name.en: The Practice and Application of Building Information Modeling (BIM)

description.zh: 本課程將介紹學生使用BIM進行建築設計、各單位的互相溝通和施工階段的圖面整合。本課程並介紹使用Revit Architecture軟體的基本概念和操作方式。通過軟體使用將引導學生以標準施工設計界面，創造參數係列和準備施工文件。
description.en: This course will introduce students to using BIM for architectural design exploration, communication, and construction. The class will introduce essential software concepts and hands-on operations with Revit Architecture. Hands-on exercises will lead students through the software interface, standard construction systems, creating parametric families and preparing construction documents.

name.zh: 服務設計與管理創業專題
name.en: Business Startup on Service Design and Management

description.zh: 從設計的立足點，探討服務管理的理論與實務應用，並以完成新創事業之服務藍圖與模型為研習目標。
description.en: From field of design, the study stresses the research and application of Service Management theories, and aims at the completion of service blueprints and service models for a startup business.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

name.zh: 綠能產業政策與經濟分析
name.en: Industrial Policy of Green Energy and Economic Analysis

description.zh: 在推動國家經濟發展，提升環境保護和創造國家競爭力，政府對於科技政策之擬定，及科技經費之持續支持十分重要，並以此培植科技人才、將科技研發成果加以推廣。為確保有限之科技資源能夠發揮其最高之效用，建立客觀及公正之績效評估制度實屬必要。本課程擬以最近影響人類生活環境甚巨之全球暖化現象( Global Warming )，及其引發之綠能科技投資為例，探討綠能科技政策之擬訂，以及綠能產業經濟分析。綠色能源包括風能、太陽能、生質能、氫能與燃料電池、地熱能、海洋能與淨煤技術，發展綠能產業即具備「3E」平衡發展之功效，已成各國追求之目標。本課程預計將涵蓋以下主題：�X替代能源介紹（包括生質能源，如生質柴油與酒精汽油，以及氫能與燃料電池等）�X再生能源介紹（包括太陽能、風能、水力發電、地熱及海洋能等）�X二氧化碳捕捉與封存、淨煤專題�XLED專題等
description.en: Many scientists conclude that the increased greenhouse effect is already accelerating global warming and leading to the climate change. Worldwide government are taking measures to tackle this issue and outlining strategies to bring the greenhouse effect under control.Greenhouse gas emissions in Taiwan are mainly from burning fossil fuels such as crude oil, coal and LPG and the energy imports have reached 99.22%. Therefore, the sustainable development in any country is to increase the proportion of self-generation of energy, reduce the emission of GHGs, and balance among Economic Growth, Environment Protection and Energy Supply.Green energy (Renewable energy) covers the fields of solar and wind energy, biofuels which includes biodiesel and bioethanol, hydrogen energy and fuel cell, geothermal and ocean energy as well as clean coal combustion technologies (IGCC). Balancing development of '3E' can be achieved by developing green energy industries and which is also the goal every count

description.zh: 運用電腦軟體製作並模擬實物設計，利用電腦技巧學習模擬並展現產品之外型、結構、色彩、質感等。
description.en: This course helps students create and simulate the design of real objects with the assistance of computer in order to display the outlook, structure, color and texture of products.

notes: 日職合開須有設計基礎自備筆電及Alias軟體

description.zh: 為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。
description.en: In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.

name.en: Industrial Policy of Green Energy and Economic Analysis

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程相關之主要數值分析方法及其於大地工程之應用，如有限差分法及有限元素法。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來分析大地工程問題。
description.en: This course introduces two representative numerical methods, i.e.  finite difference method and finite element method, and their application to geotechnical engineering.  Practical engineering problem are illustrated and simulated by numerical methods in the courses.  It aims to train the students to be familiar with either the theorem of numerical analysis or the application to engineering practices.

description.zh: 由於網際網路的快速發展，帶來了一個新的商務模式的發展。本課程希望能給同學們對企業創新課題的廣泛性了解，也深入的介紹一些基本的觀念和原理原則。另外，企業創新，許多都和新科技的新應用有關，而當中許多的可能性都還在發展階段，本門課主要是在探討創新的一些基本觀念，以及國內外企業創新的案例。
description.en: Since the Internet EB fast development, the new business model should be developed. This course will offer some topics related to business innovation and management issues. The fundamental concept and theoretic principle will also introduce.   Besides, the concept and applications of business and service model, business process reengineering, and the case study will also include.

description.zh: 本課程以各種生動活潑的教學法，介紹學習科學概念、科學知識與科學基礎科目的學習理論與方法，並配合實際的案例及活動設計讓學生親身體會並實踐學習理論。
description.en: A large number of active teaching method is applied to this course by introducing the leaning theory and method for a general idea of leaning science, the knowledge of science and the core subject of science, moreover, to harmony with the actual cases and the creative activities in order to make the students realize and practice the learning theory in person.

name.en: Entrepreneurship Practices: The Apprentice in NTUT

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，讓學生實際組成團隊進行創業，並有老師全程指導實踐創業，學校並提供基本創業基金與創業場地，輔導學生實際體會創業的過程。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、經營模式建立、創業財務、創業專題進行、創業競賽等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

notes: 經管三、碩與最後一哩合.經審核才可修課.詳請見課綱

name.en: Design and Practice of Integrated Circuit Layout

description.zh: 本課程將介紹layout(佈局)和先進製程的密切關係，從佈局設計流程之基本觀念及 EDA 軟體的使用到更深入探討 layout 的架構設計和先進製程中layout遇到的瓶頸和困難；課程內將教授並探討不同實務架構的layout問題和解決方法，其中包含標準電路元件(Standard cell)、記憶體 (Memory) 、類比暨混合信號 (Analog and mixed signal)，最後透過本課程的期末報告練習，可了解實務界中layout design的挑戰和對未來先進製程的重要性並提升學生往後在業界的競爭力。
description.en: Integrated circuit (IC) layout design plays a big role in the current semiconductor industry, especially for the most advanced technology. This course explores the big task of IC layout design and the practical problems with solutions in different layout fields, such as standard cell design, memory design, analog design, and mixed-signal field. This course introduces the students to the process, tools, and methodology of IC layout design. Moreover, it also provides the students with the insight into the exciting field of semiconductor technology and electronic devices. By going through the final project and competition, students will be brought to the next level of layout field and will have a wider vision to realize IC layout design.

notes: 電子大四、電子所、電機所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Japanese Ⅱ

description.zh: 本課程為日語與文化(一)之進階課程，提供學生養成進階日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course is designed for students who has basic Japanese knowledge or who passed the language course: Japanese (I) in the previous term. This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life. In addition, using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

notes: 優先開放修畢國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)選

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.
